translation.en: [man on radio] This is Irv Jackson on Smile NYC,
translation.zh: 这里是“微笑纽约市”的厄夫·杰克逊

translation.en: un-stuffing you from Thanksgiving, -easing you into your Christmas groove. -["Merry Merry Christmas" playing]
translation.zh: 帮你消化感恩节的晚餐 放松踏入圣诞节的氛围

translation.en: Next up at 6:00 a.m., drive-time's number one DJ,
translation.zh: 接下来 早晨六点 早高峰排名第一的DJ

translation.en: -your adrenaline rush, Rush Williams. -♪ Ever you ready, brother unite us ♪
translation.zh: 你们的活力拉什 拉什·威廉姆斯

translation.en: Now, time to kick off the holidays with this new classic from John Legend:
translation.zh: 现在 为假日开一个好头 让我们来听听约翰·传奇的新经典

translation.en: "Merry Merry Christmas."
translation.zh: 《圣诞快乐》

translation.en: -♪ Have a merry, merry Christmas ♪ -Evie.
translation.zh: 埃维

translation.en: -♪ Have a merry, merry Christmas ♪ -You are not texting Daddy at 5:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 怎么凌晨五点就开始给老爸发信息了

translation.en: -[circus whistle notification] -[girl] I want a mini horse.
translation.zh: 我想要一匹迷你马

translation.en: -[slide whistle notification] -[horse galloping steps]
translation.zh: （埃维/加比/老爸）

translation.en: -Sweetheart, -[keyboard clicking] Santa knows when you're awake.
translation.zh: 甜心 你不好好睡觉 会被圣诞老人知道的

translation.en: -You better close those eyes. -["sent" notification]
translation.zh: 你最好赶紧闭上眼睛

translation.en: Mini horse.
translation.zh: 迷你马

translation.en: -[slide whistle notification] -[girl 2] Me too.
translation.zh: 我也要

translation.en: [chuckles] Gabby, nice kids don't wake up until seven.
translation.zh: 加比 好孩子七点前是不会醒来的

translation.en: -♪ I made a little list ♪ -Still got it.
translation.zh: 依旧如此潇洒

translation.en: -[song abruptly stops] -I gotta put a jungle bell on you, girl.
translation.zh: 我真应该给你戴上个铃铛呀 姑娘

translation.en: [chuckles] Red Eye Double Shot.
translation.zh: “两份浓缩红眼咖啡”

translation.en: Aw.
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: -The taste of how much you really care. -Oh, please. [laughs]
translation.zh: -能喝得出来你有多在乎 -噢 少来了

translation.en: -[phone alert] -I take a three-mile detour to buy a five-dollar cup of coffee to make sure
translation.zh: 我只是绕了五公里路 买了一杯五美元的咖啡

translation.en: -my star DJ is in his chair on time. -[alert] That's what I care about this morning.
translation.zh: 保证我的明星DJ能准时坐上播报椅 这就是我今早最在乎的

translation.en: -Yeah, well, your star DJ -[typing]
translation.zh: 是啊 不过 你的明星DJ自己也有车

translation.en: has got a car of his own. It's nicer than yours.
translation.zh: 是啊 不过 你的明星DJ自己也有车 而且比你的那辆要好

translation.en: -[alert] -You blowin' up? -Uh, the twins' Christmas list. -["sent" whoosh]
translation.zh: -手机被打爆了呀？ -啊… 是双胞胎的圣诞礼物单

translation.en: I got to be out of here by 4:00.
translation.zh: 我四点前必须要走

translation.en: You just got here, Aunt Jo.
translation.zh: 你才刚到呢 乔姑姑

translation.en: Just letting you know, I have other engagements.
translation.zh: 只是跟你说一下 我还有其他约要赴

translation.en: -[giggles] Good morning, Josephine. -[alert]
translation.zh: 早上好 乔瑟芬

translation.en: Don't mind him, he's dodging Christmas list demands over there.
translation.zh: 别在意他 他正在那边躲圣诞礼物单呢

translation.en: The twins want tiny horses.
translation.zh: 双胞胎想要小马

translation.en: These babies will never get tired of stuffed animals.
translation.zh: 这俩宝贝要多少毛绒玩具都不嫌多

translation.en: No. These kids are not playing.
translation.zh: 不 宝贝们可不是在开玩笑

translation.en: They want real, hay eating, pooping, miniature horses.
translation.zh: 她们想要的是活生生的 会吃草会大便的迷你马

translation.en: [neighing] Whooooaa. Okay.
translation.zh: 哎呦 好吧

translation.en: [Roxy] You could make them lunch.
translation.zh: 你可以给她们做午餐啊

translation.en: Takes five minutes, shows a whole lot of love.
translation.zh: 最多花五分钟 表达一片爱意

translation.en: Cash is for me. I make the lunches.
translation.zh: 钱是给我的 午餐我来做

translation.en: Aunt Jo used to pack a bag for me every single day before school.
translation.zh: 以前乔姑姑每天上课前 都会给我准备午餐

translation.en: And since Paula passed, she does the same for the kids.
translation.zh: 自从宝拉去世后 她每天也会给孩子们准备

translation.en: I always try to slip something sweet in there.
translation.zh: 我总会给她们塞上一点糖果

translation.en: She's worth it.
translation.zh: 要好好珍惜她

translation.en: [soft groan] If I didn't share a bathroom with my sisters,
translation.zh: 要是我不用跟我的姐妹们 共用一间厕所

translation.en: and one of them hadn't dropped my phone in the toilet,
translation.zh: 要是其中一个 没把我的手机丢进马桶里

translation.en: and if the rice had worked,
translation.zh: 要是用米干燥有用的话

translation.en: and if you didn't insist on me learning a lesson about all of that,
translation.zh: 要是你不坚持要我从中吸取教训的话

translation.en: -I would've texted this list. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -这个单子我发信息就行了 -早上好

translation.en: My "musts" are highlighted in pink.
translation.zh: 必须要的都用粉色标亮了

translation.en: Hold on, Miss Mya. Read the list to me, Rush.
translation.zh: 呃 等等 米娅小姐 把单子读给我听 拉什

translation.en: [Rush] Prada bag,
translation.zh: 普拉达包

translation.en: Broadway night in NYC.
translation.zh: 去纽约市看百老汇

translation.en: Uh-uh, Mya, we talked about this. Extra is not the goal.
translation.zh: 不行 米娅 我们谈过了 不要太作

translation.en: [yawns] It's too early for teachable moments.
translation.zh: 大清早的 可不是说教的时候

translation.en: -[Roxy sighs] -[Aunt Jo] The richer you get, the greedier those kids get.
translation.zh: 你越有钱 孩子就越贪

translation.en: Grab, grab, grab.
translation.zh: 要呀要

translation.en: Take, take, take.
translation.zh: 拿呀拿

translation.en: [Rush] Love you.
translation.zh: 爱你哦

translation.en: Oh, good morning, Jamal. -Good morning. -[laughs]
translation.zh: -早上好 贾马尔 -早上好

translation.en: -Oh, you up for that "early action" day, -[slap hands] -ain't that right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 噢 你一大早起来 是为了那个“提早行动”日 对么？

translation.en: -[Rush] Yeah. -Oh, did you hear yet?
translation.zh: -是啊 -喔 有什么消息了吗？

translation.en: No, not yet. But I'm still waiting on the email.
translation.zh: 不 还没有 但我还在等电邮呢

translation.en: [steady exhale] You're getting in, you're getting in. And we got the back up schools.
translation.zh: -你肯定能进 能进的 -而且我们有后备学校的

translation.en: -Well, Harvard is the goal, Dad. -Yes.
translation.zh: -哈佛才是目标 老爸 -是的

translation.en: Hush it down, eyes on the prize.
translation.zh: 说什么呢 要盯紧了目标上

translation.en: -Can I talk to my son? -Yeah, Dad.
translation.zh: 让不让我跟儿子说话了？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, my gosh. Listen, you've got this, Jamal.
translation.zh: 我的天呐 听着 你肯定没问题的 贾马尔

translation.en: There has only been Harvard. There will only ever be Harvard.
translation.zh: 要盯紧了哈佛 我们非哈佛不上

translation.en: -Thanks, Roxy. -That's where it's at. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -多谢 洛克茜 -这样想才对嘛

translation.en: Well, now, you'll have to excuse me. Just got air flowing through these lungs.
translation.zh: 好了 我要失陪一下 刚刚跑完一圈

translation.en: Now I have to stretch. Got to keep the J-Train on track, you know?
translation.zh: 得去拉伸一下了 要想“贾马儿"跑 就得多做操 你懂的

translation.en: -[Roxy cackles] Love it. -[Jamal] All right.
translation.zh: -说得真妙 -好嘞

translation.en: That boy's gonna be taller than me in two days.
translation.zh: 这孩子马上要长得比我高了

translation.en: [laughs] I'm telling you. -[laughs] -Where'd he get that wit from, hmm?
translation.zh: 是啊 他这股机灵劲儿 是从哪里来的 嗯？

translation.en: -I don't know. You know, -[cackles]
translation.zh: 我也不知道诶 不过有一点拉什的风采

translation.en: -...it's got a Rush vibe to it, though. -Mm-hmm. Fame before beauty, get on in.
translation.zh: 我也不知道诶 不过有一点拉什的风采 嗯嗯… 名人比美女要紧 你先上车吧

translation.en: And do not spill that coffee. I just got your last sticky out.
translation.zh: 另外别又把咖啡洒了 我才刚把你上回弄的清理掉

translation.en: -You drive too fast. -Well, you late too much.
translation.zh: -是你车开得太快 -谁叫你每次都这么晚

translation.en: -Good morning, Rush. Good morning, Roxy. -[Rush] Morning.
translation.zh: -早安 拉什 早安 洛克茜 -早上好 加内拉

translation.en: We have 95 seconds until air,
translation.zh: 我们还有95秒就要开播了

translation.en: I still need to do a sound check, go over the Christmas songs list.
translation.zh: 我还需要检测一下音效 复查一下圣诞歌单

translation.en: I gotta get you out as soon as we wrap, you still have Marshall at ten o'clock.
translation.zh: 我们一结束 你们就得准备好 十点钟还要跟马歇尔见面

translation.en: And Boris never called me back. It's been three days, I gave that numpty
translation.zh: 鲍里斯一直没回我电话 已经三天了 亏我还给那个笨蛋糖红薯吃呢

translation.en: -my candied yams. -Janella, I need you to move the dial down
translation.zh: 亏我还给那个笨蛋糖红薯吃呢 听着 加内拉 我需要你稍稍消停点 好吗？

translation.en: -to, like, a five. Okay? It's early. -Yo!
translation.zh: 听着 加内拉 我需要你稍稍消停点 好吗？ -大清早的 -哟！

translation.en: With a face like that,
translation.zh: 长得这么帅

translation.en: I don't know why you be doing radio, though.
translation.zh: 我都不明白你干嘛非要搞电台

translation.en: -[drawn out] Golly. -[camera shutters]
translation.zh: 真！帅！

translation.en: Hey, there's my Adrenaline Rush.
translation.zh: 嘿 我的活力拉什在这儿呀

translation.en: Katrina, you need to keep that attitude up all day, you hear me?
translation.zh: 卡特丽娜 你一整天都要 保持这样的态度 知道吗？

translation.en: Those attitudes better stay in their dress, Katrina.
translation.zh: 这么大的态度 别把衣服撑破了 卡特丽娜

translation.en: Boy, come on. Hey.
translation.zh: -喂 快走 -嘿

translation.en: -You got to let me get my little shine on. -You know what, I need you to focus.
translation.zh: 你总得让我乐呵乐呵吧 我本来给你们买了咖啡的 但…

translation.en: [Janella] I bought you guys coffee, but I got stressed out and drank it.
translation.zh: 我本来给你们买了咖啡的 但… 我压力太大 自己喝掉了

translation.en: [over speakers] This is Irv Jackson waking you up.
translation.zh: 这里是厄夫·杰克逊 把你叫醒

translation.en: Now, get ready for Rush Williams to get you going.
translation.zh: 接下来由拉什·威廉姆斯伴你上路

translation.en: Testing, testing.
translation.zh: -测试测试 -嗯 你的确是在测试我的耐性

translation.en: Yeah, testing me is right. Listen here, Mister Star. [laughs]
translation.zh: -测试测试 -嗯 你的确是在测试我的耐性 -听好了 明星先生 -遵命 老板

translation.en: -Yes, boss. -Thanksgiving is over. No more turkey.
translation.zh: -听好了 明星先生 -遵命 老板 -感恩节结束了 别再聊火鸡了 -遵命 老板

translation.en: -Yes, boss. -We start playing Christmas music today.
translation.zh: -感恩节结束了 别再聊火鸡了 -遵命 老板 今天我们要播圣诞节的音乐了

translation.en: Well, let's sleigh away. You like how I did that? "Sleigh."
translation.zh: 那就这么“橇”定了 喜欢我这个双关么？雪橇的“橇”

translation.en: Janella sent you my approved Christmas hits list?
translation.zh: 加内拉把我批准的 圣诞热门歌单发给你了？

translation.en: -Yes, I did. -Studied, memorized, digitized.
translation.zh: -嗯 对 我发了 -研究了 记住了 蓄势待“放”了

translation.en: -Uh-huh. And so we're gonna stick to that. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 啊哈 要乖乖按照计划好的播

translation.en: [Roxy] No hip hop.
translation.zh: -嗯哼 -不许放嘻哈

translation.en: Live in five, four, three...
translation.zh: 开播倒计时 五 四 三…

translation.en: Good morning, my people. NYC, Queens, Brooklyn, Strong Island.
translation.zh: 早上好 听众朋友们 纽约市 皇后区 布鲁克林区 长岛区

translation.en: It's your morning shot of Adrenaline Rush on Smile NYC.
translation.zh: 这里是“微笑纽约市” 为你们带来活力的正是我活力拉什

translation.en: Floss that turkey out your teeth
translation.zh: 快把牙缝里的火鸡剔去

translation.en: because Rush Williams is about to put you on a steady diet of tinsel tunes.
translation.zh: 因为拉什·威廉姆斯 马上要为你献上圣诞大餐了

translation.en: Whether you're driving to work, driving to the mall,
translation.zh: 无论是你在去上班的路上 去商场的路上

translation.en: or just letting Christmas drive you crazy.
translation.zh: 还是圣诞节正在让你抓狂

translation.en: Let's get turnt up with this old school jam
translation.zh: 让我们一起听着这首老派金曲燥起来

translation.en: dedicated to my firstborn, Jamal.
translation.zh: 献给我的大儿子 贾马尔

translation.en: Today's going to be a very special day for him, y'all.
translation.zh: 今天对他来说非常特殊 大家伙儿

translation.en: "Christmas in Hollis," Run DMC!
translation.zh: 《霍利斯的圣诞节》 Run DMC！

translation.en: Oh, here we go!
translation.zh: 喔！搞起来！

translation.en: [Rush and Run DMC together] ♪ It's Christmas time in Hollis, Queens ♪
translation.zh: 皇后区霍利斯迎来了圣诞

translation.en: ♪ Mom's cookin' chicken And collard greens ♪
translation.zh: 老妈正煮着那鸡肉与甘蓝

translation.en: ♪ Rice and stuffing, macaroni and cheese ♪
translation.zh: 米饭同填料 芝士通心粉

translation.en: ♪ And Santa puttin' gifts Under Christmas trees, oh... ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞老人正将礼物往圣诞树下扔 喔…

translation.en: Every damn day.
translation.zh: 每次都这样

translation.en: -♪ In the fire place is the yule log ♪ -Stop it.
translation.zh: 别跳了

translation.en: ♪ The rhymes that you hear Are the rhymes of Darryl's... ♪
translation.zh: 喔！

translation.en: [Aunt Jo singing "Jingle Bells"] ♪ Jingle, jingle, jingle bells ♪
translation.zh: 叮叮当 叮叮当

translation.en: -[pan clanking] -♪ Jingle all the way ♪
translation.zh: 铃儿响叮当

translation.en: -[pan sizzling] -Good morning. -Morning, baby. -[peck]
translation.zh: -早上好 -早安呀 宝贝

translation.en: Gabby, Evie.
translation.zh: 加比 埃维

translation.en: -Backpacks? -Check!
translation.zh: -背包？ -带上了

translation.en: -Homework? -Check!
translation.zh: -作业？ -带上了

translation.en: -Sugar? -[peck]
translation.zh: 亲一口？

translation.en: -Check. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 带上了

translation.en: All right, make some room. The email has arrived.
translation.zh: 好了 都让我一下 电邮来了

translation.en: -From who, you ask? -I usually ask "from whom"?
translation.zh: -你问是谁发来的？ -我通常这么问 “何人来信”？

translation.en: Why, the one and only Harvard University. That's right, [drawn out] Harvard.
translation.zh: 是独一无二的哈佛大学 没错 哈佛发来的

translation.en: -[Mya laughs] -Hold for applause.
translation.zh: 请鼓掌

translation.en: -[Aunt Jo] Jamal. Email? -[dish rattles]
translation.zh: 贾马尔 电邮？

translation.en: -Yeah. -That's good, right?
translation.zh: -是啊 -这是好消息 对吧？

translation.en: Ooh, don't know yet. But, I want to wait and open it with Dad.
translation.zh: 哦 还不知道呢 我想留着跟老爸一起打开

translation.en: I mean, I'd accept me.
translation.zh: 换了是我 肯定会录取我的

translation.en: One giant step forward for Jamal P. Williams.
translation.zh: 贾马尔·P·威廉姆斯向前的一大步

translation.en: -[Mya laughs] -No matter what that email says, I'm proud of you, baby.
translation.zh: 无论这封电邮上怎么说 我都为你感到自豪 宝贝

translation.en: Wonder if I can get a prime parking space at Harvard for that new whip
translation.zh: 不知道我能不能 在哈佛搞到一个好停车位 我打赌圣诞节早晨圣诞老人肯定会 给我送辆扎了红蝴蝶结的新车来

translation.en: with the red bow I bet Santa's dropping off for me Christmas morning,
translation.zh: 我打赌圣诞节早晨圣诞老人肯定会 给我送辆扎了红蝴蝶结的新车来

translation.en: -you know? -Mm-hmm. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你懂么？嗯 你懂的

translation.en: You're fortunate children, to have all of this.
translation.zh: 你们都是幸运的孩子 能拥有这一切

translation.en: If I was Santa, I'd fly right over this house.
translation.zh: 如果我是圣诞老人 我肯定从这家房顶上飞过去

translation.en: When I was coming up, five of us shared one egg.
translation.zh: 我小的时候啊 一个鸡蛋我们五个人分着吃

translation.en: And the only way we got bacon
translation.zh: 我们唯一能尝到培根的机会

translation.en: is if the neighbors were cooking it on a windy day.
translation.zh: 是大风天邻居在隔壁烧 我们才能闻一闻

translation.en: -That song gets sadder every time. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 这话说得一次比一次惨

translation.en: I mean, one egg?
translation.zh: 一个鸡蛋？太夸张了吧？

translation.en: -[Mya] I know. -[Jamal] I know.
translation.zh: -是啊 -就是啊

translation.en: Eat your breakfast.
translation.zh: 好好吃早饭

translation.en: Mmm...
translation.zh: 呃…

translation.en: -Glaring at me with those business eyes. -Better to remind you
translation.zh: 这双生意之眼是要盯死我啊 我再提醒你一回 必须给我播

translation.en: that you have got to play the Christmas songs
translation.zh: 我再提醒你一回 必须给我播 批准过的热门歌单里的歌

translation.en: from the approved "hit" list.
translation.zh: 批准过的热门歌单里的歌

translation.en: We need to play this safe, Rush.
translation.zh: 我们得保守点 拉什

translation.en: What happened to "My music, my rules. My music rules"?
translation.zh: 不是说好要“我的音乐我做主”吗？

translation.en: Not all the time. And this is definitely one of those times.
translation.zh: 也不能总这样啊 至少现在不是时候

translation.en: Rush, come on. You want skin in the game,
translation.zh: 拉什 别这样 你想在这行做下去

translation.en: -you gotta play the game. -No.
translation.zh: -就得按照规矩来啊 -不

translation.en: -You know that? -I do. I know.
translation.zh: -你懂的吧？ -是 我懂

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: Now the station is in the black, and ratings are up,
translation.zh: 现在电台有盈利 收听率又节节高攀

translation.en: and ad revenue is solid. We have taken this show to number one.
translation.zh: 广告收入也很稳定 我们已经把这个节目做到了第一名

translation.en: Now we have to make the board see it our way,
translation.zh: 现在我们得让董事会明白我们的远见

translation.en: and then we can be...
translation.zh: 这样我们就能成为…

translation.en: ...station owners.
translation.zh: 电台的主人了

translation.en: [stammers] Wait, I thought you...
translation.zh: 等等 我还以为…

translation.en: Well, part station owners, [stammers] but it's still huge.
translation.zh: 好吧 电台共有人 但已经很了不起了

translation.en: Focus with me! Do you see it?
translation.zh: 专心听我说！你能看到吗？

translation.en: -I see it. -Are you sure you see it?
translation.zh: -看到了 -你真的看到了吗？

translation.en: I can see it.
translation.zh: 我真看到了

translation.en: -Now, we can do this. -We can do this together.
translation.zh: -嗯 我们一定能做到 -我们一起就能做到

translation.en: -That's right. -Yes.
translation.zh: -没错 -对

translation.en: Damn right.
translation.zh: 这样才对嘛

translation.en: So let's close this deal, and then we can start breaking the rules.
translation.zh: 所以我们要先把这笔生意敲定 然后就可以开始打破条条框框了

translation.en: Counting on it. Looking forward to it. Absolutely.
translation.zh: 等不及了 期待死了 没问题

translation.en: -Yeah. -You know what I'm looking forward to?
translation.zh: -嗯 -你知道我还期待什么吗？

translation.en: -That big, fat Christmas bonus check. -[inhales]
translation.zh: 那张丰厚的圣诞奖金支票

translation.en: It needs to have like a gang of zeros in it,
translation.zh: 上面最好有一大堆零

translation.en: and a couple commas.
translation.zh: 越多越好

translation.en: 'Cause I done spent like four of them zeros.
translation.zh: 因为我已经花了几万块了

translation.en: [Mya] Hey, Daniels!
translation.zh: 喂 丹尼尔！

translation.en: -Miss Williams. -Time for a come-to-Jesus moment.
translation.zh: -威廉姆斯小姐 -是时候好好谈谈了

translation.en: We need Phase One completed by Christmas.
translation.zh: 我们必须要赶在圣诞前完成第一阶段

translation.en: That pool needs to be dug before the ground freezes,
translation.zh: 泳池必须在地面结冰之前挖好

translation.en: because you know that thaw won't happen until March,
translation.zh: 因为你知道融冰季节要等到三月

translation.en: and that puts our Memorial Day timetable in jeopardy.
translation.zh: 这样一来我们亡灵纪念日的安排 又要出问题了

translation.en: -But, Miss Williams-- -If there's OT...
translation.zh: -可是威廉姆斯小姐… -如果要加班的话…

translation.en: -[song continues] ♪ Ooh, ooh... ♪ -...my daddy's good for it.
translation.zh: 我爸会出钱的

translation.en: You're the boss.
translation.zh: 都听你的 大老板

translation.en: -All right. -[thud] You ready to seal this deal?
translation.zh: 好嘞 准备好签约了吗？

translation.en: -Total station domination. -That's it. [laughs]
translation.zh: -称霸全站 -这样才对

translation.en: Yes, I know. It's Christmas. Yes.
translation.zh: 是 是 我知道现在是圣诞节 我知道

translation.en: But everybody's gonna have to take a cut back.
translation.zh: 但所有人都得减薪

translation.en: Yeah, it's time for me to be Scrooge, I'm not playing.
translation.zh: 对 我不得不做一把吝啬鬼了 我不是在闹着玩

translation.en: [quiet] Sorry about that. Hold on.
translation.zh: 不好意思 稍等

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Well, it's about to get real "bah-humbug-y" around here,
translation.zh: 喔 没错 这边很快就要腥风血雨了

translation.en: and I'm not playing.
translation.zh: 我可不是闹着玩的

translation.en: I ain't taking no favorites or playing no favorites.
translation.zh: 我会公平对待 不偏不倚

translation.en: Everybody's gon' feel it, and you gonnna feel it too, you hear me?
translation.zh: 每个人都会感觉到 你也会感觉到的 你听明白了吗？

translation.en: Okay, Ma. All right.
translation.zh: 行 妈 好的

translation.en: [softer] Love you, too. Bye.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 拜

translation.en: [phone cover whacks closed] Rush! Roxy! -That's us. -[laughter]
translation.zh: -拉什！洛克茜！ -正是我们

translation.en: -Roxy and Rush! -It's still us.
translation.zh: -洛克茜和拉什！ -还是我们

translation.en: -What's up? -All right, Marshall,
translation.zh: -怎么样啊？ -好嘞 马歇尔

translation.en: you know what time it is. It's time to talk ownership.
translation.zh: 你知道接下来要干嘛的 是时候谈谈所有权的事了

translation.en: This might be the worst day for that.
translation.zh: 今天可能是最不巧的时候

translation.en: WMLE just got bought.
translation.zh: WMLE刚被收购了

translation.en: Walk with me.
translation.zh: 跟我走一趟

translation.en: Bought by who, fam?
translation.zh: 被谁收购了 亲？

translation.en: Slow down, fam. Slow down. Hold up. We were for sale?
translation.zh: 噢 慢点说 亲 慢点 等等 我们什么时候要卖了？

translation.en: Everything and every thang is for sale, Rush.
translation.zh: 这世上一切都是可以被买卖的 拉什

translation.en: You ever hear of Camfort Communications?
translation.zh: 你们听说过康姆福特通讯吗？

translation.en: Of course, CamCom.
translation.zh: 当然了 康通嘛

translation.en: It's a massive network. Satellite. Broadcast. They're sharks, though.
translation.zh: 是一家巨型的通讯公司 卫星和广播都有涉猎 不过他们都是狠角色

translation.en: Yeah, they are. Hey, girl. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没错 跟鲨鱼似的… 嘿 姑娘

translation.en: I heard she wears her clothes with the tags still in 'em. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我听说她穿衣服标签都不撕的

translation.en: Well, anyway, WMLE just got chomped on.
translation.zh: 言归正传 WMLE这回就被鲨鱼吞了

translation.en: Like, chomp-chomped. To the bone.
translation.zh: 被生吞活吃了 骨头也没吐

translation.en: And now, we are part of CamCom.
translation.zh: 现在 我们是康通的一部分了

translation.en: Wait. Hold on, give me a minute here, Marshall.
translation.zh: 等等 等一下 给我一分钟 马歇尔

translation.en: 'Cause being a part of that network,
translation.zh: 因为成为这个通讯公司的一部分

translation.en: it's the big time. Slam dunk.
translation.zh: 应该是大成功啊 大灌篮

translation.en: -[Marshall] Hmm. -Like, I'm feeling very LeBron right now, am I readin' this right?
translation.zh: 我现在觉得像勒布朗一样 是这么个情况吗？

translation.en: Well, it is game time, LeBron.
translation.zh: 嗯 要上赛场了 勒布朗

translation.en: CamCom suits wanna meet you all. All right?
translation.zh: 康通的高层想见见你们俩 知道么？

translation.en: -[Roxy] What? -Yo.
translation.zh: -什么？ -哟

translation.en: This could be big for us.
translation.zh: 我们可能有大事啊

translation.en: Trust me. It's all good.
translation.zh: 相信我 肯定会没事的

translation.en: Oh... Right.
translation.zh: 哦… 对

translation.en: Hey, what up? -[Rush] What up? -[Marshall] All right, don't get up.
translation.zh: 嘿 各位好么？好嘞 别站起来

translation.en: Rush Williams,
translation.zh: 拉什·威廉姆斯

translation.en: Roxy Richardson, meet Joss Hawkins,
translation.zh: 洛克茜·理查森 认识一下乔斯·霍金斯

translation.en: executive vice president, acquisitions and development at CamCom,
translation.zh: 康通收购与开发部的执行副总裁

translation.en: or what I like to call her, my spanking new boss.
translation.zh: 我喜欢管她叫 “要虐待我的女王”

translation.en: Spanky there.
translation.zh: 感谢你的虐待 女士

translation.en: -I could get used to that. -I could get used to it, too.
translation.zh: -我会习惯的 -我也很快就会习惯的

translation.en: Very impressive group. Very impressive.
translation.zh: 大家非常了不起 非常之厉害

translation.en: Quiet group.
translation.zh: 大家都很安静啊

translation.en: Let's get right to it. I have more people to see.
translation.zh: 我们就直奔主题吧 我还有好多人要见

translation.en: Our plan is to launch
translation.zh: 我们的计划是

translation.en: a new national morning drive-time show in time for Christmas.
translation.zh: 赶在圣诞期间 开播一个全国性的早间高峰节目

translation.en: [Rush] National? I like that.
translation.zh: 全国性的啊？我喜欢

translation.en: You know what? I always thought of myself as national,
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？ 我一直以来都觉得自己该放眼全国

translation.en: you know, and I knew that you would see it.
translation.zh: 你知道么 我就知道你看得出我的潜力

translation.en: I knew you would, and you. I never met none of y'all,
translation.zh: 我一早就知道 还有你也是 虽然你们我一个都没见过

translation.en: but I knew deep down inside, I knew that y'all knew.
translation.zh: 但我内心深处一早就知道 我就知道你们都懂我

translation.en: Oh. What the-- what the--? DJ Stacy K.
translation.zh: 哦 搞什… DJ史黛西·K

translation.en: I love her. I like her. She...
translation.zh: 我喜欢她 很喜欢 她…

translation.en: [stammering] Why she in my... convertible, though?
translation.zh: 可她为什么坐在我的… 我的敞篷车里？

translation.en: Wait, we doing a co-host thing, now? -[Roxy scoffs] -Is that... Oh, you gonna add me in later?
translation.zh: 等等 我们现在是要搭档主持了？ 是不是… 哦 你之后要把我加进去？

translation.en: Rush, Roxy.
translation.zh: 拉什 洛克茜

translation.en: We appreciate everything you've done here at WMLE,
translation.zh: 我们很感激你们为WMLE做的一切

translation.en: but we are heading in a different direction.
translation.zh: 但我们打算朝一个不同的方向发展了

translation.en: But we drove you here.
translation.zh: 可这一路来都是我们在开车

translation.en: Yes, and now we are taking the wheel.
translation.zh: 没错 但现在方向盘要交给我们了

translation.en: [Roxy] Just like that?
translation.zh: 就这么简单？

translation.en: After we built up the numbers? After we got the audience reach?
translation.zh: 在我们辛苦把数字搞上去之后？ 在我们建立起观众群之后？

translation.en: -We're done. -[Roxy] Mm--
translation.zh: 我们谈完了

translation.en: [stammers] Just so you know, this is not taking the wheel.
translation.zh: 跟你说清楚了 这根本不是交方向盘

translation.en: This is called a carjacking. This is called a carjacking.
translation.zh: 这叫做劫车！这就是劫车！

translation.en: -[Marshall] Guys. -[Rush] This is...
translation.zh: -两位 -这就…

translation.en: -Let's talk outside. -[Rush] Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们到外面去谈

translation.en: [stammering] So, what I'm supposed...
translation.zh: 所以我就该… 我就应该…

translation.en: -[Roxy sighs] Open the door. -[soft] Let's talk outside.
translation.zh: -开门！ -我们外面谈

translation.en: That was fun, right?
translation.zh: 刚才挺好玩的 对吧？

translation.en: Go get me some water.
translation.zh: 给我去弄杯水来

translation.en: I am Rush Williams! You don't do that to Rush Williams!
translation.zh: 拉什·威廉姆斯 拉什·威廉姆斯

translation.en: Look at me! Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我！

translation.en: Number one! And here, look! What does that say?
translation.zh: 第一！还有这里 你看！ 上面怎么写的？

translation.en: [gasps] Number one! And guess what?
translation.zh: 第一！你猜怎么着？

translation.en: -Highest rated! Fan favorite! -[thudding]
translation.zh: 收听率最高！听众最爱！

translation.en: I'm the star man! You don't do this to the star man!
translation.zh: 我可是电台之星！ 你怎么能这么对电台之星？

translation.en: And you are huge! In R&B, though.
translation.zh: 你很红是没错！但那是在R&B界

translation.en: Stacy K is number one in Pop.
translation.zh: 史黛西·K是流行界的第一

translation.en: In New York, and Los Angeles, and soon to be the entire nation!
translation.zh: 在纽约和洛杉矶 很快就要称霸全国了

translation.en: This is out of nowhere, Marshall. Is that it? We're off the air?
translation.zh: 这也太突然了 马歇尔 到此为止了？我们就这样停播了？

translation.en: The devil is a lie!
translation.zh: 怎么可能停播呢！

translation.en: Why would you think that I would possess that kind of energy to do that to you?
translation.zh: 你们怎么会觉得 我会忍心做这样的事？

translation.en: -Come on! No, you have not. -You know what?
translation.zh: 拜托 -噢 -不 你不会的

translation.en: -Oh. Thank God. -I got a little emotional.
translation.zh: -我太情绪化了 -感谢主

translation.en: You did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm going to give you a grand finale show tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天会给你们 安排一集隆重的大结局的

translation.en: [yelling] Oh, come on, man! I got kids, man.
translation.zh: 别这样 大哥！我有孩子的 大哥 现在可是圣诞节啊！

translation.en: -It's Christmas! -And I feel you!
translation.zh: 别这样 大哥！我有孩子的 大哥 现在可是圣诞节啊！ 我理解你 黑爷们对黑爷们 听着…

translation.en: Black man on black man. Look... [slaps]
translation.zh: 我理解你 黑爷们对黑爷们 听着…

translation.en: The holidays is coming up, I get that, and it's hard on everybody.
translation.zh: 马上就是假日了 我明白 发生了这件事 大家都不好过

translation.en: I mean, not me. 'Cause I'm cashing in. Big time.
translation.zh: 好吧 除了我以外 因为我这回是狠狠地赚了一笔

translation.en: You really gonna look us in our eye and say that? You gonna fix your mouth
translation.zh: 你还说这样的风凉话？ 开完这个会 你还张得开嘴说这样的话？

translation.en: to say that after we met today? You know why we met, Marshall!
translation.zh: 开完这个会 你还张得开嘴说这样的话？ 你知道我们今天见面为啥吗 马歇尔 你看到这些了吗？

translation.en: You see this right here?
translation.zh: 你知道我们今天见面为啥吗 马歇尔 你看到这些了吗？

translation.en: This is a plan. Know what's in it?
translation.zh: 这个计划 知道里面是啥？

translation.en: -[Marshall] What-- -Graphs! Pie charts!
translation.zh: -什… -曲线图！饼图！

translation.en: A proposal to own part of this station, Marshall!
translation.zh: 这是成为电台共有人的提案 马歇尔

translation.en: And I understand that, [stammers] but you...
translation.zh: 这点我理解 可你…

translation.en: [stammering] This... These... Are these the numbers?
translation.zh: 这… 这些… 这是我们台的数据？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: I'm so mad y'all didn't become part owners before the deal went through.
translation.zh: 我太生气了 你们没能赶在 这次的交易前做成共有人

translation.en: -I mean, look at this. These numbers... -Okay, okay.
translation.zh: -瞧瞧这个 这些数据… -好了

translation.en: At least we got our bonuses to look forward to.
translation.zh: 至少我们还有奖金可以期待一下

translation.en: [stammers] Got your what?
translation.zh: 还有什么

translation.en: [stammers] Our bonuses.
translation.zh: 我们的奖金

translation.en: -WMLE does the bonuses. -Oh! Oh, your bonuses. Oh...
translation.zh: -WMLE向来都发奖金的 -噢 你们的奖金 噢

translation.en: Yeah... about that...
translation.zh: 嗯… 关于这件事…

translation.en: I don't believe this. How they gon' do this to us?
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 他们怎么能这么对我们？

translation.en: [Roxy] Exactly. This is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 没错！这也太荒谬了

translation.en: [Rush] H-how did she even get the position? [Roxy] I should've seen this coming.
translation.zh: -她到底是怎么得到这份工作的？ -我应该早点预料到的

translation.en: [Rush] Hey, I guarantee you, they gon' regret it.
translation.zh: 嘿 我向你保证 他们肯定会后悔的

translation.en: I guarantee you they gon'-- they gon' be callin' me back.
translation.zh: 嘿 我向你保证 他们肯定会后悔的 他们肯定会求我回来的

translation.en: -Oh, this is painful, Roxy. -I know, but--
translation.zh: -喔 这太痛苦了 洛克茜 -我知道 但…

translation.en: No, no, this changes too much.
translation.zh: 不 这样的变化太大了

translation.en: This changes too much.
translation.zh: 这样的变化太大了

translation.en: When I walk into that booth,
translation.zh: 当我走进那个录音棚

translation.en: and I settle into my chair, and I lean in...
translation.zh: 坐上自己的椅子 向前一靠…

translation.en: I smell the metal of that microphone...
translation.zh: 闻到那只话筒的金属味时…

translation.en: and it gets me going.
translation.zh: 这就是我的动力

translation.en: The second that mic is hot, we are live, and that is my moment
translation.zh: 话筒开启的那一秒 我们开始直播 那就是我与听众交流的瞬间

translation.en: to connect with my people.
translation.zh: 那就是我与听众交流的瞬间

translation.en: And you might think that I'm freestyling, but no, my message is clear,
translation.zh: 你可能以为我是在自由发挥 但并不是 我的信息很明确

translation.en: and it is from my heart.
translation.zh: 是发自内心的

translation.en: Every... single show, I try to nail that.
translation.zh: 每一…场节目 我都想尽力做到最好

translation.en: Every single day, for all these years and to just...
translation.zh: 每一天… 这么多年来 结果却…

translation.en: To just have it yanked away from you like...
translation.zh: 就这样硬生生被人夺走了

translation.en: It just feels like I'm losing a body part. -[wind, vehicles whirring]
translation.zh: 感觉就好像我失去了身体的一部分

translation.en: And I-- I'm not ready to say goodbye. I'm not.
translation.zh: 而且我… 我还没做好告别的准备 我没准备好

translation.en: Listen...
translation.zh: 听着…

translation.en: we've been knocked down before.
translation.zh: 我们以前也被打倒过

translation.en: We just got to find a way to get off the pavement, that's all.
translation.zh: 我们只需要想办法再从地上爬起来 就这么简单

translation.en: What am I going to tell the kids, though? Okay, Christmas is around the corner!
translation.zh: 可我要怎么跟孩子们说呢？ 好吗 圣诞节马上就要到了

translation.en: Man, those little faces. They just want so much.
translation.zh: 唉 那一张张小脸 他们想要的这么多

translation.en: I mean expect so much. Not so much expect, as demand.
translation.zh: 好吧 应该说有很多期待 好吧 不是期待 是要求

translation.en: They threaten me, even. [stammers] I tell you, the twins pulled a knife.
translation.zh: 他们还威胁我了 甚至 我跟你说 双胞胎刀都掏出来了

translation.en: Hey, this is going to work out.
translation.zh: 嘿… 事情会解决的

translation.en: It is.
translation.zh: 肯定的

translation.en: 'Tis the season, right? Just got to have a little faith.
translation.zh: 毕竟是圣诞季节嘛 对吧？ 只要心中有信念就行

translation.en: Do you really believe that?
translation.zh: 你真的这么想吗？

translation.en: Isn't that what people are supposed to say during Christmas?
translation.zh: 大家过圣诞节的时候 不都是这么说的吗？

translation.en: Come on. I'll drop you home. Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧 我送你回家 快来

translation.en: ♪ Oh tidings of comfort and joy ♪
translation.zh: （拉什）

translation.en: -Okay, girls. -[bags rustling]
translation.zh: 好嘞 女儿们

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好嘞

translation.en: -Let me help you, Daddy. -Oh, thank you, baby girl. Here you go.
translation.zh: -让我帮你吧 老爸 -哦 谢谢了 宝贝女儿 给你

translation.en: That one, there. Don't forget that one.
translation.zh: 那一个 那边的 别忘了那一个

translation.en: Good looking out.
translation.zh: 眼睛真尖

translation.en: [Evie] What kind of snack are you making for us? [Gabby] I want pizza.
translation.zh: -你要给我们做什么点心？ -我想吃比萨！

translation.en: [Rush] Thanks for--
translation.zh: 谢谢你帮…

translation.en: Oh, no. What am I going to do about the pool?
translation.zh: 糟糕 这泳池我要怎么办？

translation.en: [Gabby] No worries, Mya had a "come-to-Jesus" with Daniels.
translation.zh: 别担心 米娅跟丹尼尔好好谈了一回

translation.en: Straight up, she lit a fire under him.
translation.zh: 她一说 他立马就干劲十足

translation.en: But there's going to be something called OT.
translation.zh: 但加班工资是少不了了

translation.en: [Rush] Really? Lacrosse?
translation.zh: 真的？长曲棍球？

translation.en: -[Evie] Yes, Daddy. -[Gabby] It builds team work.
translation.zh: -没错 老爸 -能培养团队默契的

translation.en: Yeah, but these things cost a lot of money.
translation.zh: 是 但这些东西要花很多钱的

translation.en: Yeah, we're really bad at it, too.
translation.zh: 是啊 而且我们也打得很不好

translation.en: Well, you should give it up! Only rich people play lacrosse.
translation.zh: 那你们就不要再打了！ 只有富人才玩长曲棍球的

translation.en: -I know. -Right?
translation.zh: -我知道 -对吧？

translation.en: -[descending footsteps] -[Mya] We're home!
translation.zh: 我们回来了！

translation.en: Oh, Pops, you're home. I've been waiting. I got the email.
translation.zh: 噢 爸 你回来了 我一直在等你呢 我收到电邮了

translation.en: -Oh, you got the email. -[Jamal] Yeah.
translation.zh: 噢 你收到电邮了

translation.en: -Oh, my God, you got the email. -[Evie] Open it! I want to see it!
translation.zh: -我的天 你收到那封电邮了！ -快打开

translation.en: [Gabby, high pitch] Hey. Oh, my goodness!
translation.zh: -太好了 -噢 我的天呀！

translation.en: Gabby, take my phone.
translation.zh: 加比 把我手机拿来

translation.en: We need to memorialize my triumph. Dad, get behind me for the reaction shot.
translation.zh: 我们需要记录下我的胜利时刻 老爸 到我后面来 拍个反应照

translation.en: -[Rush] Huh. -[bags thud]
translation.zh: 啊

translation.en: -[giggling] -Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: All right. I waited to open this together.
translation.zh: 好嘞 我等了好久 就是为了要一起打开

translation.en: One for the Jamal Williams future archives.
translation.zh: 这将成为贾马尔·威廉姆斯 未来的档案之一

translation.en: Definitely wanna film both our faces when we find out.
translation.zh: 一定得把我们俩 看到结果时的表情拍下来

translation.en: Son, will you open the email? You're killing me, just open the email.
translation.zh: 儿子 你能不能快打开啊？ 你要急死我啊 快打开这封电邮吧！

translation.en: Okay, I love that you're as excited as I am.
translation.zh: 好吧 你跟我一样激动 这点我很高兴

translation.en: -[Rush] Hey, Jamal. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿 贾马尔 -嗯？

translation.en: It is okay if you don't get in. Okay?
translation.zh: 就算你没被录取也没关系的 好吗？

translation.en: I didn't go away to college,
translation.zh: 我也没有上过大学

translation.en: and I don't want you to think of it as a failure.
translation.zh: 我不想让你觉得这是一次失败 我想让你觉得这是…

translation.en: I want you to think of it as carrying on that family tradition, right?
translation.zh: 我不想让你觉得这是一次失败 我想让你觉得这是… 继承家族传统 好吗？

translation.en: -'Cause that tradition-- -I got in!
translation.zh: -因为这传统… -我被录取了！

translation.en: -[Mya gasps] -I'm in!
translation.zh: 录取了！

translation.en: -Who's going to Harvard? Me! That's right. -[Rush] Yeah.
translation.zh: -谁要去上哈佛呀？没错就是我 -对

translation.en: -Man, you must be so pumped for me. -Oh, I am, of course, I mean... [chuckles]
translation.zh: -老爸 你肯定很为我激动吧 -哦 激动 当然了 那个…

translation.en: It's great if you're into that Ivy League-y sort of vibe, you know?
translation.zh: 这很棒呀 如果你… 喜欢常春藤联盟的那种氛围

translation.en: -Yay! -[Rush] You know what you should do?
translation.zh: -耶！ -但你知道你该怎么做？

translation.en: You should check out my Alma Mater. For safety.
translation.zh: 你应该去看看我的母校 保险起见

translation.en: The Queensborough Community College? Instead of Harvard?
translation.zh: 去皇后区社区大学？不去哈佛？

translation.en: -[Jamal] Oh, you are hilarious. -I got you.
translation.zh: -噢 你… 你真是太搞笑了 -老爸很会说笑的

translation.en: Oh, man. And look, no worries. I checked and paying a little extra,
translation.zh: 噢 对了 别担心 我查过了 如果多付一点钱

translation.en: a freshman can park a car on campus.
translation.zh: 新生也可以在校区内停车的

translation.en: -There's no car. There's no car. -Yeah, yeah. It's not December 25th yet.
translation.zh: -哪来的车啊？ -我懂我懂 还没到12月25日

translation.en: Blah-blah-blah.
translation.zh: 少来这一套了！

translation.en: We're taking the Jamal Williams experience to Ivy League!
translation.zh: 我们要把贾马尔·威廉姆斯的体验 带去常春藤联盟！

translation.en: -[girls, together] Yay! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 太好咯！

translation.en: You're too young to be referring to yourself as a brand.
translation.zh: 你年纪轻轻 不应该把自己当成品牌来称呼的

translation.en: -You know that? -[Jamal] You do it all the time.
translation.zh: -你懂的吧？ -你不也老这样么

translation.en: -[Rush] Uh-huh. -So... [exhales]
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: [kids chanting] Harvard! Harvard! Harvard!
translation.zh: 哈佛！哈佛！哈佛！

translation.en: Why did I have to have smart kids? Dumb kids are way cheaper.
translation.zh: 我为什么要生这么聪明的孩子？ 蠢孩子要便宜多了

translation.en: Why aren't you sharing in that child's joy?
translation.zh: 你为什么不为那孩子感到开心呢？

translation.en: 'Cause it's over. It's all over. We are ruined. Ruined!
translation.zh: 因为结束了 一切都结束了 我们完蛋了 完蛋了！

translation.en: It's a dark day, Aunt Jo.
translation.zh: 今天很倒霉啊 乔姑姑

translation.en: It's dark. It's a dark day. I don't know what happened.
translation.zh: 倒霉 今天真太倒霉了 我都不知道怎么回事

translation.en: I ain't even see it coming.
translation.zh: 我完全没想到会这样

translation.en: Are you done? For whatever that was?
translation.zh: 你有完没完 怎么回事？

translation.en: The radio station sold.
translation.zh: 广播电台被卖掉了

translation.en: Job gone.
translation.zh: 工作没了

translation.en: No more radio. It's done.
translation.zh: 电台没有了 完蛋了

translation.en: -You've saved. I know you've saved. -How, Aunt Jo?
translation.zh: -你有存钱的对吧 我知道你存了 -怎么存啊 乔姑姑？

translation.en: The bills, they get higher every month. We got fresh bills!
translation.zh: 开销啊 每个月都越花越多 我们刚收到一堆新账单！

translation.en: Jamal had to go to Costa Rica to volunteer to dig wells,
translation.zh: 贾马尔要去哥斯达黎加做志愿者挖井

translation.en: so that they could have "clean water."
translation.zh: 这样他们才能有“干净的水”喝

translation.en: Mya's platinum status on Saks.com, and the twins, there's two of them!
translation.zh: 米娅在萨克斯第五大道有白金会员 还有双胞胎 两倍的花销啊！

translation.en: And they all go to private school. Not to mention, it's Christmas.
translation.zh: 他们都上私立学校 更不用说 现在圣诞节要到了

translation.en: Rashon James Williams!
translation.zh: 拉什·詹姆斯·威廉姆斯

translation.en: You spoil those kids.
translation.zh: 是你宠坏了这些孩子

translation.en: They snap their fingers, and you open your wallet.
translation.zh: 他们打打响指 你就打开钱包

translation.en: I've been trying to be both parents.
translation.zh: 我努力又当爹又当妈的

translation.en: Give them everything they wanted because I can't be everything,
translation.zh: 尽量满足他们的一切需要 因为我也不是万能的啊

translation.en: and yeah, okay, [stammering] maybe I gave a little too much.
translation.zh: 好吧 没错 好吧 也许我的确是太宠了一点

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 你还知道哦？

translation.en: That life's about to change.
translation.zh: 这样的生活要改变了

translation.en: -Straight up. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -说得对 -没错

translation.en: We're about to make some changes around here.
translation.zh: 我们这个家要好好做些改变了

translation.en: -Snap the whip. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 鞭子拿起来

translation.en: Things about to get tight. They about to get lean.
translation.zh: 手头要拮据起来了 要勒紧裤腰带了

translation.en: These kids gonna be giving up a whole lot. How do I tell them that?
translation.zh: 这些孩子们要戒掉好多东西了 我要怎么跟他们说？

translation.en: I don't wanna tell them that. Aunt Jo, please.
translation.zh: 我不想跟他们说 乔姑姑 求你了

translation.en: You tell them and bake 'em a pie, okay? I'mma go lay down.
translation.zh: 你去跟他们说 给他们烤个馅饼 好吗？我得去躺一下

translation.en: This is not a pie situation, son.
translation.zh: 现在不是烤馅饼的时候 孩子

translation.en: Remember what your granddaddy said.
translation.zh: 想一想你爷爷说的话

translation.en: It's not what you got, it's what you got around you.
translation.zh: 最重要的是亲情 而不仅仅是财富

translation.en: [whispering] What about Christmas for the kids?
translation.zh: 孩子们的圣诞节怎么办？

translation.en: It's going to be all right.
translation.zh: 肯定会没事的

translation.en: Have a little faith.
translation.zh: 只要心中有信念

translation.en: Everybody keeps telling me that.
translation.zh: 大家都跟我这么说

translation.en: [Rush] That was the Everly Brothers,
translation.zh: 刚才那首是艾佛利兄弟的

translation.en: "Christmas Eve Can Kill You."
translation.zh: 《圣诞夜可能会害死你》

translation.en: Stay tuned for a word from our sponsors.
translation.zh: 接下来请收听我们赞助商要说的话

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Rush out.
translation.zh: 拉什要走了

translation.en: Forever.
translation.zh: 永远地走了

translation.en: -[smooth jazz Christmas music playing] -[Janella] Should I call 911?
translation.zh: 我应该打911吗？

translation.en: Rush's mental state doesn't seem stable.
translation.zh: 拉什的精神状态好像不太稳定

translation.en: That's not the note we should have gone out on for your last show.
translation.zh: 我们的最后一场节目不应该这样收尾

translation.en: You want fans to follow you wherever you go.
translation.zh: 你应该想让听众们跟着你 无论你去哪里

translation.en: Not follow you off a cliff.
translation.zh: 而不是跟着你跳崖

translation.en: You got to rise above this nonsense.
translation.zh: 你必须要克服这一切

translation.en: Be Rush.
translation.zh: 做回拉什

translation.en: Be my star.
translation.zh: 做回我的明星

translation.en: Well, if I'm going down in flames...
translation.zh: 如果说我要跌入万丈深渊…

translation.en: I'm glad you're the one burning with me.
translation.zh: 我很高兴有你陪着我

translation.en: -We're poor? -[funky music playing]
translation.zh: 我们成穷人了？

translation.en: -Did I say we were poor? -But you don't have a job.
translation.zh: -我刚才说我们是穷人了吗？ -但你现在没工作了

translation.en: And you pretty much broadcasted that to everyone.
translation.zh: 而且你基本上是向全世界宣布了

translation.en: Brilliant!
translation.zh: 棒极了！

translation.en: -So, no horse? -It's mini-sized.
translation.zh: -所以没有马了？ -是迷你的那种呀

translation.en: None of that is happening, okay?
translation.zh: 这些都不会有了 好吗？

translation.en: In fact, there's a whole lot of not happening
translation.zh: 实际上 还有好多本来要有的东西

translation.en: -that's about to start happening. -[groans]
translation.zh: -以后都不会有了 -等等 哈佛也没有了吗？

translation.en: -Wait, is Harvard not happening? -I want it to.
translation.zh: -以后都不会有了 -等等 哈佛也没有了吗？ 我让你上啊

translation.en: -So, what's the plan? -I don't know yet, son.
translation.zh: -那我们有什么计划？ -我还不知道 儿子

translation.en: -Great. -Great.
translation.zh: 真棒 -真棒 -嘿

translation.en: Hey, give me some time.
translation.zh: 给我点时间

translation.en: -Unbelievable. -So bad.
translation.zh: -真不敢相信！ -太糟糕了

translation.en: -[retreating footsteps] -[Gabby] This is worse than bad!
translation.zh: 这比糟糕还糟糕！

translation.en: [Rush] Y'all sitting all off in the bleachers -like y'all can't hear the conversation? -[Roxy sighs]
translation.zh: 你们俩刚才坐在那边一声不吭 假装不会说话呐？

translation.en: Looks like you have plans for a holly jolly Christmas.
translation.zh: 看起来你已经做好准备 要过一场温馨快乐的圣诞节

translation.en: [sighs] Rush, we need to talk.
translation.zh: 拉什… 我们需要谈一谈

translation.en: -Did it come through yet? -It's getting close. [exhales]
translation.zh: -那件事完成了吗？ -应该快了

translation.en: -[Aunt Jo] Did you tell him yet? -I don't have all the details.
translation.zh: -你还没告诉他吗？ -我还没完全了解清楚呢

translation.en: You know, I kinda like and dislike the fact that y'all are so close.
translation.zh: 你们俩走得这么近 我有点高兴也有点不高兴

translation.en: -Mostly dislike. -[Roxy] Okay.
translation.zh: -主要是不高兴 -好吧

translation.en: Rush, what if I told you that Krush BQL is for sale?
translation.zh: 拉什 如果我告诉你 WBQL要出售了呢？

translation.en: Well, great, more people losing their jobs.
translation.zh: 哦 太棒了 更多的人要失业了

translation.en: No, it closed down a couple months ago.
translation.zh: 不 它几个月前就关门了

translation.en: The building is for sale. The station is up for grabs.
translation.zh: 整栋大楼都在出售 电台要被收购了

translation.en: So, WBQL is for sale. What's for dinner?
translation.zh: 不就是WBQL要出售了吗 晚餐吃什么

translation.en: I figured you'd make it after you finish all your decoration.
translation.zh: 我还以为等你把装饰做完之后 你会自己做呢

translation.en: Hey! Listen to me. We should buy that station.
translation.zh: 喂！听我说 我们应该把那个电台买下来

translation.en: With what, Roxy? My megawatt smile?
translation.zh: 用什么买啊 洛克茜？ 用我十万伏特的微笑吗？

translation.en: With money!
translation.zh: 用钱啊！

translation.en: I built up a pretty hefty 401k.
translation.zh: 我的退休基金里存了不少钱

translation.en: You'd put that up for me?
translation.zh: 你愿意为了我全拿出来？

translation.en: For us.
translation.zh: 为了我们

translation.en: I'm touched, Roxy, for real.
translation.zh: 我很感动 洛克茜 真的

translation.en: But it'd take a much bigger Christmas miracle than that.
translation.zh: 但我们需要一个 更大的圣诞奇迹才能买得起

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Is this big enough?
translation.zh: 这个够大了吗？

translation.en: Aw.
translation.zh: 嗷

translation.en: That's sweet, Aunt Jo. But I don't think your little coffee can stash
translation.zh: 心意我领了 乔姑姑 但我不觉得 这一小咖啡罐的私房钱能帮得上忙

translation.en: is going to help much.
translation.zh: 但我不觉得 这一小咖啡罐的私房钱能帮得上忙

translation.en: [chuckles] There's $45,000 in there.
translation.zh: 这里边有四万五

translation.en: You wouldn't happen to have more of these stashed under the house, huh?
translation.zh: 你该不会在这家里 藏了好几个这样的咖啡罐吧？

translation.en: Oh, no, honey, that's my mad money.
translation.zh: 哪里啊 亲爱的 这只是我的零花钱而已

translation.en: My investment manager takes care of all the big stuff.
translation.zh: 大钱都由我的投资经理管着呢

translation.en: Wait, does everyone else have money stashed away but me?
translation.zh: 等等 是不是除了我之外 所有人都存着钱啊？

translation.en: 'Cause my money just seems to fly away before I can grab it.
translation.zh: 因为我的钱好像长翅膀会飞一样 我抓也来不及抓

translation.en: -Rush. -Yes?
translation.zh: -拉什 -嗯？

translation.en: You got your first break at that station, right?
translation.zh: 你最初就是在那个电台走红的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Let's get back to where we started.
translation.zh: 对吧？让我们一起回到最开始的地方

translation.en: Isn't that what we always dreamed of?
translation.zh: 这不是我们一直以来的梦想吗?

translation.en: That station is way down the dial, Roxy.
translation.zh: 那个电台的波段很难调啊 洛克茜

translation.en: Yeah, but I miss the time when we ruled the airwaves.
translation.zh: 是啊 但我很怀念 我们以前主宰电波的时候

translation.en: We just got kicked off the airwaves last week.
translation.zh: 我们上周才被踢下电波呢

translation.en: We could be a part of the community again, right?
translation.zh: 这样我们又能 成为社区的一部分了 对吧？

translation.en: Remember block parties, and pop-up concerts?
translation.zh: 记得那些邻里派对和快闪演唱会吗？

translation.en: Charity drives?
translation.zh: 慈善筹款活动？

translation.en: We could sponsor Christmas dinner at First Community Church.
translation.zh: 我们可以在第一社区教堂 办一场圣诞晚宴

translation.en: -Yeah. -Come on, we used to live for that.
translation.zh: -记得 -对吧 我们以前就是指着这个活的

translation.en: And the WMLE suits shut all of that down,
translation.zh: 后来WMLE的高层把这些都禁掉了

translation.en: and we can bring it all back.
translation.zh: 我们有机会能再搞起来了

translation.en: -[serene instrumentals] -Can't you see it?
translation.zh: 你就看不到吗？

translation.en: We get to play the music we want.
translation.zh: 我们可以放我们想放的音乐

translation.en: We get to play the music we want.
translation.zh: 我们可以放我们想放的音乐

translation.en: It's like the universe is screaming at us right now.
translation.zh: 简直就像是这宇宙 在冲着我们喊叫似的

translation.en: Let's build Krush BQL back up.
translation.zh: 我们一起重建WBQL吧

translation.en: -We'd be taking a huge risk huge. -Huge, yeah.
translation.zh: -我们这样做要冒的风险很大啊 -很大是没错 对

translation.en: Risk? Eh... Why don't you let me handle that?
translation.zh: 至于风险呢… 不如就全交给我吧

translation.en: Yeah? Is that a yes?
translation.zh: 好吗？这算是答应了吗？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 答应了？

translation.en: -Start counting. -Yes!
translation.zh: -期待起来吧 -太好了！

translation.en: Oh, it's about to be real merry up in here.
translation.zh: 噢 这里终于要快乐起来了

translation.en: -Wow. Okay. All right. -Whoo!
translation.zh: -哇喔 好吧 好的 -唔呼！

translation.en: -[melodic] Rush and Roxy! -[Rush] Hey!
translation.zh: -拉什和洛克茜！ -嘿！

translation.en: -That's it. -[Rush] Oh!
translation.zh: -就这么定了 -噢！

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -All right. Old school. Never mind.
translation.zh: 好吧 太老派了 算了

translation.en: Listen, hey, I'm seeing a bright star on our horizon.
translation.zh: 听着 各位 我能看得到眼前 有一颗亮闪闪的星星

translation.en: -[playful Christmas instrumentals] -An opportunity for all of us.
translation.zh: 一个我们所有人的机会

translation.en: My old station,
translation.zh: 我以前的电台

translation.en: the one that got the Rush engine on the track to begin with, is for sale.
translation.zh: 就是让我拉什这辆火车 步上正轨的那个 现在要卖了

translation.en: And Roxy and I are buying it.
translation.zh: 洛克茜和我打算把它买下来

translation.en: Sounds like somebody's spending money we don't have.
translation.zh: 听起来有人要花一笔 我们没有的钱了

translation.en: Will you hear me out?
translation.zh: 能不能听我说完？

translation.en: I'm going to need all of you.
translation.zh: 我需要你们所有人的帮助

translation.en: Even Aunt Jo kicked in a little cash.
translation.zh: 就算是乔姑姑也贡献了一点钱

translation.en: -And I know that it's Christmas-- -[Mya] Oh.
translation.zh: -我知道圣诞节要来了… -哦

translation.en: I figured Christmas was already off the table.
translation.zh: 我早就知道圣诞节是没戏了

translation.en: Not necessarily, but there will be some sacrifices.
translation.zh: 也不一定 但我们要做出一点牺牲

translation.en: Now, in order for me to come up with my share of the money
translation.zh: 好了 为了凑出我的那份钱

translation.en: to buy the station,
translation.zh: 来买下这个电台

translation.en: -I'm going to need to... [muffled speech] -What?
translation.zh: -我需要把… -什么？

translation.en: -[Mya] What was that? -I'm sorry, what?
translation.zh: -你刚才说什么？ -再说一遍？

translation.en: I said, I'm going to need to put the house... [garbling]
translation.zh: 我说 我需要把这栋房子…

translation.en: -[Gabby] Hmm? -You have to speak louder.
translation.zh: -嗯？ -你得再说得大声点

translation.en: I'm going to need to sell our house.
translation.zh: 我要把我们的房子卖了

translation.en: -Wait, our house? -Oh, snap!
translation.zh: 等等 我们住的房子？ 哎呦喂！

translation.en: I didn't see homeless on the menu.
translation.zh: 我没想到晚餐要上无家可归这道菜啊

translation.en: I am always going to provide for you kids, okay? [stammering] But let's face it.
translation.zh: 我当然会负责赚钱养你们几个孩子的 好吗？但我们得面对现实

translation.en: We've gotten a little... What's the word?
translation.zh: 我们过去是有点太… 怎么说来着？

translation.en: Bougie.
translation.zh: 小资？

translation.en: Will you finish eating your pizza, please?
translation.zh: 你能不能先吃完自己的比萨啊？

translation.en: Now, stay with me.
translation.zh: 好了 听我说

translation.en: Just stay with me, here. I want you to think big picture, right?
translation.zh: 听我把话说完 我要你们把眼光放长远一点 好吗？

translation.en: This is a better future for all of us. This is our way out of this mess.
translation.zh: 这能给我们家一个更好的将来 这是我们摆脱困境的方法

translation.en: Are you ready?
translation.zh: 你们准备好了吗？

translation.en: -We're moving back into our old house. -[record scratch]
translation.zh: 我们要搬回老房子去

translation.en: -What old house? -The house that you were raised in, son.
translation.zh: 什么老房子？ 你小时候住的那个房子啊 儿子

translation.en: -What? -But Auntie Jo lives there now.
translation.zh: -什么？ -可是现在乔姑姑住在那里啊

translation.en: There are five of us.
translation.zh: 我们有五个人

translation.en: That is a whole mess of people in that tiny house.
translation.zh: 那么小一栋房子 我们这么一大堆人

translation.en: There can't possibly be enough space.
translation.zh: 怎么可能挤得下啊

translation.en: Listen, as long as we're together, we'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 听着 只要我们在一起 会有办法的

translation.en: One bathroom, six people. I rest my case.
translation.zh: -一间厕所 六个人 这就够了 -你…

translation.en: You... Mya, you should be lucky we have this option.
translation.zh: -一间厕所 六个人 这就够了 -你… 米娅 有这条退路已经很幸运了

translation.en: I can't believe this. I am not going back there.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 我是不会回去的

translation.en: The decision's already been made.
translation.zh: 事情已经定下来了

translation.en: And I bet your big picture has me waving goodbye to my future.
translation.zh: 我打赌你这长远眼光 是要看着我跟我的未来挥手道别了

translation.en: You think this is easy?
translation.zh: 你觉得我这么做很容易？

translation.en: I remember you painting daisies all over that mailbox.
translation.zh: 我记得你在那个信箱上画满了雏菊

translation.en: Trying to make it look all cheery.
translation.zh: 好让它看起来欢快一点

translation.en: Like we were getting something other than bills. [laughs]
translation.zh: 假装我们收到的东西 不只是账单而已

translation.en: I wish bills were my only problem right now.
translation.zh: 我好希望账单是我现在唯一的问题

translation.en: Oliver Street.
translation.zh: 奥利弗街

translation.en: Still holding it down.
translation.zh: 依然好好的呢

translation.en: [Rush] Ah, man.
translation.zh: 啊 唉

translation.en: Oh, Paula, we had it all.
translation.zh: 宝拉 我们那时什么都不缺

translation.en: This little house. You and me.
translation.zh: 有这么栋小房子 你和我

translation.en: One bathroom.
translation.zh: 一间厕所

translation.en: A leaky roof.
translation.zh: 一个漏水的屋顶

translation.en: -Where we got our start. -[chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 我们开始的地方

translation.en: Moving the kids back in, that's...
translation.zh: 让孩子们搬回这里 肯定…

translation.en: that's going to be tough.
translation.zh: 肯定会很艰难

translation.en: -They'll be okay. -[wind whirring] They just need time to adjust.
translation.zh: 他们没问题的 只是需要些时间来适应

translation.en: I thought I made it.
translation.zh: 我以为我成功了

translation.en: Thought I'd built them a life.
translation.zh: 以为我已经给他们创造了好生活

translation.en: You did.
translation.zh: 你确实做到了

translation.en: And you gotta keep chasing those big dreams of yours.
translation.zh: 你必须继续追求你的那些伟大梦想

translation.en: And not just the station.
translation.zh: 不仅仅是这个电台而已

translation.en: She's a good woman, Rush.
translation.zh: 她是个好女人 拉什

translation.en: You're ready.
translation.zh: 你已经准备好了

translation.en: I don't know what I'm ready for.
translation.zh: 我不确定我准备好干什么了

translation.en: Cherish the times that we had, but...
translation.zh: 珍惜我们度过的时光 但也…

translation.en: turn the page.
translation.zh: 翻开新的篇章

translation.en: You've still got a lot of life ahead of you.
translation.zh: 你的生活还有很长的路要走

translation.en: he opened up all the Christmas presents? [laughing]
translation.zh: 他把所有的圣诞礼物都拆开了

translation.en: He would not take off that sapphire necklace I bought you.
translation.zh: 他怎么也不肯把 我给你买的那串蓝宝石项链摘下来

translation.en: Was it you or me who let him wear it to church?
translation.zh: 是你还是我让他戴着去教堂来着？

translation.en: Paula, is that you? Are you giving me a sign?
translation.zh: 宝拉 是你吗？你这是在示意我吗？

translation.en: [woman over intercom] You better get off my porch. I got a bat and a bad attitude.
translation.zh: 你最好赶快从我的前院滚出去 我手上有根棒子 而且我脾气很差

translation.en: Aunt Jo?
translation.zh: 乔姑姑？

translation.en: -[blip of static] -Oh, baby, it's you! You know, I can see you on my phone.
translation.zh: 噢 宝贝 是你啊！ 我能在手机上看到你

translation.en: The things they come up with!
translation.zh: 这些新发明啊 真是太神奇了

translation.en: I'm telling you about this violence.
translation.zh: 你这暴力行为 我说过多少次了

translation.en: You gotta stop threatening people, Aunt Jo. Seriously.
translation.zh: 你不能再这样威胁别人了 乔姑姑 说真的

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] A few weeks before Christmas?
translation.zh: 还有几周圣诞节便要来到

translation.en: Now we gotta leave this house.
translation.zh: 我们却要从这栋房里搬掉

translation.en: Not a creature was stirring,
translation.zh: 没有一只生物在吵

translation.en: not even this angry little mouse.
translation.zh: 连这只愤怒小老鼠也不闹

translation.en: The stockings never got hung by the chimney with care,
translation.zh: 无法将长袜小心地在烟囱上挂好

translation.en: no hopes to St. Nicholas which soon would be coming here.
translation.zh: 也不敢奢望圣尼古拉很快就来到

translation.en: [Rush continues] The children were nestled, all snug in their beds,
translation.zh: 孩子们都被舒适地安顿在床铺上

translation.en: with visions of losing this sweet life probably dancing in their heads.
translation.zh: 将要失去这份美好生活的念想 可能在他们的小脑袋中游荡

translation.en: I'll... take that.
translation.zh: 我帮你拿走

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] Long day. I'm about to call it a wrap,
translation.zh: 疲惫的一天马上就要终了

translation.en: and settle my brain for a long winter's nap.
translation.zh: 放松我的大脑 趁着冬天睡上一觉

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] When under the covers there arose such a clatter.
translation.zh: 在那被单之下 发出了一声嘁喳

translation.en: -[Rush chuckles] Oh, no. -[phone clicks off]
translation.zh: 噢 不行

translation.en: No clatter tonight, baby girl.
translation.zh: 今晚不能再聊天了 宝贝女儿

translation.en: You just sleep, okay?
translation.zh: 好好睡觉 好吗？

translation.en: Saint Nick,
translation.zh: 圣尼克

translation.en: you better get our change of address.
translation.zh: 你最好收到了我们的地址变更

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[blues Christmas tune playing]
translation.zh: （离圣诞节还有8天）

translation.en: ♪ You know we're broke Again for Christmas ♪
translation.zh: （圣诞快乐）

translation.en: Excuse me. Can I-- Can I see that, please?
translation.zh: 打扰一下 可以让我看一下么？

translation.en: -What in the holiday hell is this? -[Gabby squealing]
translation.zh: 大过节的这到底是什么玩意啊？

translation.en: -[Gabby] We're crowdfunding. -[Evie] For Christmas presents.
translation.zh: -我们在搞众筹 -为了买圣诞礼物

translation.en: -[Rush] Who taught you how to crowdfu--? -[Gabby] See, look.
translation.zh: -谁叫你们怎么众… -你看

translation.en: Turns out, mini horses cost a butt-load of money, see?
translation.zh: 原来迷你马要花很多钱

translation.en: No. No, no. Sh-- no.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: You have no idea how these faces can sell.
translation.zh: 你绝对想不到 我们这两张小脸有多会演

translation.en: [Gabby] Those crutches? They're our lacrosse sticks.
translation.zh: 这两根拐杖 其实是我们打长曲棍球的球棍

translation.en: You're going to shut this down, okay? You going to shut it down right now.
translation.zh: 你们给我关掉 知道吗？ 你们立马给我关掉

translation.en: Where's your brother?
translation.zh: 你们哥哥在哪里？

translation.en: [Evie] Okay, let's do this.
translation.zh: 好 我们这么做…

translation.en: -[Rush] Wow. -[playful organ music playing]
translation.zh: 哇喔

translation.en: Huh, and I thought this was going to be tough.
translation.zh: 噢 我还以为这一切会很艰难呢

translation.en: One won't talk to me,
translation.zh: 一个不理我

translation.en: the other one won't even come inside. I got some fathering to do.
translation.zh: 另一个连家门都不愿进 我… 我要好好尽一下父亲的责任

translation.en: You go upstairs and I'll go outside.
translation.zh: 你上楼去吧 让我去外面

translation.en: Thank you, Aunt Jo.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 乔姑姑

translation.en: I'm sorry, what was that? [stammers] What'd you say?
translation.zh: 抱歉 什么？你刚才说什么？

translation.en: I didn't say anything.
translation.zh: 我什么话都没说

translation.en: What's that? Your arm fell asleep?
translation.zh: 什么？你的手臂发麻了？

translation.en: You got folded bad, and you need to get out.
translation.zh: 你被关在里面闷得要死 很想出来透透气？

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha-ha.
translation.zh: 哈哈哈哈

translation.en: I will be living out of that suitcase until you come to your senses.
translation.zh: 在你幡然醒悟之前 我会一直把东西放在行李箱里

translation.en: You need to unpack.
translation.zh: 你得把东西拿出来

translation.en: You need to make this room your own.
translation.zh: 你得把这变成你自己的房间

translation.en: It's not my room.
translation.zh: 这不是我房间

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Are you coming inside?
translation.zh: 你想进来吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Aunt Jo] Okay.
translation.zh: -不 -行

translation.en: But that's where the food is.
translation.zh: 但里面有东西吃哦

translation.en: And the warmth.
translation.zh: 还有暖气

translation.en: If you put your little Mya flavor on it, and invited some friends over...
translation.zh: 如果你按米娅风格装饰一下 再邀请些朋友过来…

translation.en: [laughs] [sarcastically] Yeah. We'll stop on that one.
translation.zh: 嗯 光这一条就够了

translation.en: I'm not bringing anyone... here.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会带任何人来… 这种地方

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？

translation.en: Jamal, your father is doing
translation.zh: 贾马尔 -你爸已经在尽全力… -阻止我达成我的目标

translation.en: -everything he can. -To stop me from getting my goals.
translation.zh: -你爸已经在尽全力… -阻止我达成我的目标

translation.en: I've worked hard to be where I am.
translation.zh: 我一直努力才有了今天

translation.en: Dedicated every shred of my life to stay on track,
translation.zh: 奉献我生命的每分每秒 走在正轨上

translation.en: and now that's trash.
translation.zh: 现在全成了垃圾

translation.en: And I hate this house.
translation.zh: 而且我很讨厌这栋房子

translation.en: No disrespect, Dad.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 老爸

translation.en: I don't know about you, but this neighborhood,
translation.zh: 我不知道你怎么想的 但这块社区…

translation.en: it's not Whitestone.
translation.zh: 可不比白石镇

translation.en: Little girl, you need to know your history.
translation.zh: 小女儿啊 你得学一下自己的历史

translation.en: This community has been part of your family's life for generations.
translation.zh: 你家好几代人都曾生活在这个社区里

translation.en: I was raised in this house.
translation.zh: 我就是在这栋房子里被养大的

translation.en: You were raised in this house. Your mother got c--
translation.zh: 你也是在这栋房子里被养大的 你妈妈得癌…

translation.en: I can't with you right now.
translation.zh: 我现在没办法对付你

translation.en: Look, you just can't understand.
translation.zh: 听着 你根本没办法理解

translation.en: What I understand is that you need to appreciate the life
translation.zh: 我理解的是 你需要学会感激

translation.en: that your father has provided you.
translation.zh: 你爸给你创造的生活

translation.en: But we lost all that!
translation.zh: 可我们全都失去了！

translation.en: I'm not talking about things.
translation.zh: 我不是在说物质上的东西

translation.en: I'm talking about family.
translation.zh: 我说的是家庭

translation.en: Usually the Lord keeps me tuned into a lot,
translation.zh: 通常主会让我及时知道很多事

translation.en: but this is the first time I'm hearing about this.
translation.zh: 但这消息我是头一回听说

translation.en: We heard about it this morning.
translation.zh: 我们是今早听说的

translation.en: And if you didn't hear your former DJ bought another radio station, well, then,
translation.zh: 如果你连自己的前DJ 要买一家广播电台的事都没听说

translation.en: you're a beat behind.
translation.zh: 你就真有点跟不上了

translation.en: This will not affect our Christmas launch.
translation.zh: 绝对不能让这事影响了 我们圣诞节开播的节目

translation.en: I mean, all due respect, but I'm not sure if there's anything
translation.zh: 恕我直言 但我不觉得 我们有什么办法来…

translation.en: -that we really can do-- -Stations need advertising.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 但我不觉得 我们有什么办法来… 电台需要广告才能活

translation.en: I mean, we just can't stop advertisers from--
translation.zh: 我们可没办法阻止广告客户投…

translation.en: We can, and you will, Marshall. We hold the cards in this market.
translation.zh: 我们有办法 而且你一定要做到 马歇尔 我们在这个市场上很有地位

translation.en: You need to flex some money muscle.
translation.zh: 你需要发挥点金钱的力量

translation.en: Advertisers must not buy any time on that station.
translation.zh: 我们的广告客户不能在那家电台投

translation.en: Oh, that's hardcore.
translation.zh: 噢 这也太狠了

translation.en: Listen, the only thing I care about is winning the market.
translation.zh: 听着 我唯一在乎的事 就是赢得这块市场

translation.en: My priority is this station beating any and all competition.
translation.zh: 我的头等大事 就是要这座电台击败所有的竞争对手

translation.en: Somebody has to win...
translation.zh: 既然有人会赢…

translation.en: -[hand whacks desk] -and that better be me.
translation.zh: 那赢的最好是我

translation.en: -Yeah. -We're done.
translation.zh: -哦 -我们说完了

translation.en: Come on, Tinker Bell.
translation.zh: 走吧 小叮当

translation.en: I don't like that dude's suits.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢那家伙的西服

translation.en: You can't do this.
translation.zh: 你不能这么做

translation.en: You heard the lady. I mean, I have no choice!
translation.zh: 你也听到了 我也是别无选择啊！

translation.en: It's Rush and Roxy.
translation.zh: 这可是拉什和洛克茜啊

translation.en: -It's just business, that's what-- -You gonna Grinch their Christmas?
translation.zh: 生意归生意嘛 这只是… 你当真要毁了他们的圣诞节？

translation.en: -Nah, it's just business. -[Janella] Wow.
translation.zh: -哪里 生意归生意嘛 -哇喔

translation.en: This is a new low.
translation.zh: 这又突破底线了啊

translation.en: [Marshall] But it's business.
translation.zh: 可做生意没办法呀

translation.en: Marshall...
translation.zh: 马歇尔…

translation.en: [laughs] You don't understand business.
translation.zh: 你不明白怎么做生意

translation.en: This house ain't so bad. You have food like this on the table.
translation.zh: 桌子上能有这样的食物 这栋房子也就显得不那么糟糕了

translation.en: Yeah, I guess it beats outside.
translation.zh: 嗯 总比外面好

translation.en: Okay, we're done.
translation.zh: 好了 我们吃完了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Don't take one more step.
translation.zh: 不许再走一步

translation.en: Santa's elves are not coming up in here, cleaning up this mess.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人的精灵 可不会来收拾这一团糟

translation.en: Gabby, Evie, your plates need to find a new home in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 加比 埃维 给你们盘子到厨房里去找个新家

translation.en: Jamal, clear off this table.
translation.zh: 贾马尔 把桌子清理干净了

translation.en: Mya, you're scrubbing skillets.
translation.zh: 米娅 你负责把煎锅刷干净了

translation.en: You're in my house now.
translation.zh: 你们现在在我家

translation.en: I'm scared of you.
translation.zh: 我很害怕你

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Good!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: 'Cause I got eyes everywhere, my children.
translation.zh: 因为我身上长满了眼睛 我的孩子们

translation.en: Back of my head, one on each elbow. You never know.
translation.zh: 脑袋后面 两只手肘上各一只 你们最好小心点

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] Children were nestled, um...
translation.zh: 孩子们都被… 嗯…

translation.en: way too snug in their beds,
translation.zh: 太舒适地安顿在床铺上

translation.en: while visions of sugarplums...
translation.zh: 这份对糖果的念想…

translation.en: [Rush] Are you...?
translation.zh: 这也太…

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] ...better keep dancing in their heads.
translation.zh: …在他们的小脑袋中游荡

translation.en: [Rush] You know what? You get to have that one. I ain't--
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？ 这次算你赢了 我不拿了…

translation.en: Saint Nick, if you don't show up...
translation.zh: 圣尼克 如果你不出现…

translation.en: you ain't got to worry about that clatter, 'cause I'm bringing it to you.
translation.zh: 你不用担心那声“嘁喳”了 因为我要来找你了

translation.en: I'm not the one. I'm really not the one.
translation.zh: 我可不好惹 我真的不好惹

translation.en: -You can try me if you want. [chuckles] -[dog continues to bark]
translation.zh: 你不信的话 可以试试看啊

translation.en: But I'm not that dude.
translation.zh: 但我真不是好惹的货色

translation.en: [Rush] Rush gon' give it to you.
translation.zh: 拉什要让给你点颜色瞧瞧了

translation.en: Hasn't changed one bit.
translation.zh: 一点也没变啊

translation.en: [lightly chuckles] You say it like it's a good thing.
translation.zh: 你说得好像这是件好事似的

translation.en: Okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好了好了

translation.en: [Roxy] I spoke to Pastor Abernathy at First Community.
translation.zh: 我跟第一社区的阿伯内西牧师说过了

translation.en: We are on for sponsoring the Christmas meal.
translation.zh: 圣诞大餐的赞助交给我们了

translation.en: That feels good.
translation.zh: 这感觉不错

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 嗯哼

translation.en: -[chair squeaking] -And how does that feel?
translation.zh: -这感觉又怎么样？ -嘎吱作响

translation.en: -Squeaky. -Listen. That chair, that squeaky chair,
translation.zh: -这感觉又怎么样？ -嘎吱作响 听着 这把椅子 这把嘎吱作响的椅子

translation.en: and everything in here,
translation.zh: 还有这里所有的一切

translation.en: in this fabulous old dump, is all ours.
translation.zh: 还有这里所有的一切 这一大堆棒极了的破旧东西 都是我们的了

translation.en: -We're business owners. -Mm-hmm
translation.zh: 我们是企业家了

translation.en: [Roxy] That's got a nice ring to it.
translation.zh: 叫起来真好听啊

translation.en: [yelling] That's my Roxy!
translation.zh: 这才是我的洛克茜嘛！

translation.en: -One, two. [chuckles] -[laughs]
translation.zh: 一二一二…

translation.en: [inhales] Well, staff starts tomorrow, and we got a week to get up and running.
translation.zh: 好了 员工明天开始上班 我们有一星期时间让电台运作起来

translation.en: It's the Holiday Rush
translation.zh: 这就是拉什欢乐假期

translation.en: -with Rush Williams on Krush BQL. -Mm.
translation.zh: -由拉什·威廉姆斯主持 就在WBQL -嗯

translation.en: [Roxy] Roxy Richardson.
translation.zh: 洛克茜·理查森

translation.en: Oh, hey, Chuck.
translation.zh: 噢 你好呀 查克

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: We were counting on you.
translation.zh: 我们本来都指望着你呢

translation.en: Yeah, but how far back do we go?
translation.zh: 是的 但我们认识有多久了？

translation.en: Yes, we helped you launch that first donut shop.
translation.zh: 没错 就是我们帮你 把那第一间甜甜圈店开起来的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Huh.
translation.zh: 啊

translation.en: Okay, I understand.
translation.zh: 好的 我明白

translation.en: It just got cold outside.
translation.zh: 外面情况不妙啊

translation.en: Marshall and CamCom have threatened our advertisers.
translation.zh: 马歇尔和康通在威胁我们的广告客户

translation.en: Marshall?
translation.zh: 马歇尔？

translation.en: We can't broadcast without advertisers, Rush.
translation.zh: 没了广告客户 我们没办法开播 拉什

translation.en: We can't...
translation.zh: 我们没办法…

translation.en: We can't?
translation.zh: 我们没办法？

translation.en: It's actually kinda dope that they're seeing us as a threat.
translation.zh: 这说来其实挺牛逼的 他们觉得我们是有威胁的

translation.en: We ain't played one song yet,
translation.zh: 我们连一首歌都还没放呢

translation.en: and they're already trying to shut us down.
translation.zh: 他们就在想办法要让我们关门

translation.en: But it's not going to happen.
translation.zh: 但我们是不会关门的

translation.en: Roxy.
translation.zh: 不会的 洛克茜

translation.en: [hesitant] Rush?
translation.zh: 拉什？

translation.en: Do me a favor. Come here.
translation.zh: 帮我个忙 过来

translation.en: I just want you to step into my office for a second, please.
translation.zh: 我想请你站到我的办公室去一下

translation.en: -[playfully scoffs] -Just have a seat.
translation.zh: 这边 坐下来就好 坐舒服了

translation.en: Now, I know I get a little sidetracked, but check this out.
translation.zh: 好了 我知道我有时可能会分心 但你听我说说看

translation.en: Let's take it one step further.
translation.zh: 我们干脆就更进一步

translation.en: Commercial-free Christmas.
translation.zh: 无广告的圣诞节

translation.en: Can you see it?
translation.zh: 你能看到么？

translation.en: You know what? I can see it.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？我确实能看到

translation.en: And, I mean, we don't have a choice, [laughs] but we can market it like we do.
translation.zh: 那个… 我们虽然是别无选择 但我们可以营销成我们是故意的

translation.en: -Fake it till you make it. -Okay?
translation.zh: -如想成功 必先假装成功 -好诶

translation.en: -Yes. -WBQL...
translation.zh: -没错 -WBQL…

translation.en: Oh. "Nothing but Christmas." [gasps]
translation.zh: 噢… “唯有圣诞节”

translation.en: It's like a gift to your listeners, billboards with your face.
translation.zh: 算是送给听众们的一份大礼 再把你的脸放上广告牌

translation.en: That's gonna get their chestnuts roasting, ain't it?
translation.zh: 这保证能让他们 乐得烤起栗子来 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, let me run these numbers,
translation.zh: 好 我去好好算一下

translation.en: but with the money coming in from your house,
translation.zh: 但有了你房子的钱

translation.en: we should be able to operate without new revenue for a little while.
translation.zh: 我们应该能在 没有其他收入的情况下运营一会儿

translation.en: Until the ratings come in, and the listeners come in,
translation.zh: 等收听率起来了 听众们过来了

translation.en: and then advertisers will be running to buy airtime.
translation.zh: 然后客户肯定会 争先恐后地来 买广告位的

translation.en: -Yes. -This is a short-term loss
translation.zh: -没错 -这只是短期的亏损

translation.en: -for long-term gain. -Yes, it is. Yes.
translation.zh: -换的是长期的盈利 -没错 正是好 没错

translation.en: This is... [stammers] You know what I got to do?
translation.zh: 这是… 你知道我要干什么？

translation.en: -What you got to do? -I got to go and start getting these kids
translation.zh: -你要干什么？ -我要让这些小鬼们

translation.en: into this kinda holiday feeling. I got to...
translation.zh: 感受一下这假日的气氛 我要…

translation.en: -Okay. [laughs] -I don't know, man.
translation.zh: -好 -怎么说呢

translation.en: I want them to feel that Christmas spirit, you know what I mean? Can you feel it?
translation.zh: 我想让他们感受到这圣诞精神 你明白吗？你能感受到吗？

translation.en: -I can feel it. -[funky music playing] [playfully drawn out] I'm saying, Roxy, can you really feel it?
translation.zh: -我能感受到 -我说 洛克茜 你能感受到吗？

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Rush] Make you want to, uh! [laughs]
translation.zh: 让你想要… 啊！

translation.en: Hey, thank you.
translation.zh: 天呐 谢谢你

translation.en: [gruff exhale] All right, I'll call you later.
translation.zh: 好嘞 我晚点打给你

translation.en: -[laughs] Okay. -[Rush] Trying to shut us down.
translation.zh: -好 -还想让我们关门

translation.en: And I'ma whoop Marshall's butt when I see him.
translation.zh: 下次再让我见到马歇尔 我要揍死他

translation.en: -[funky "O Come O Come Emmanuel" playing] -[Rush] I'm thinking, if it was up to me,
translation.zh: 好 我在想啊 如果让我选的话 我们应该搞一个

translation.en: we would get a little table top tree -like this. -[Mya] Uh, no! No, I like that one.
translation.zh: -像这样的桌上圣诞树 -呃 不行 我喜欢那棵

translation.en: [Rush] No, you got to meet me in the middle somewhere.
translation.zh: -那棵！ -不 你得跟我妥协… -我们各让一步 -不 别这样

translation.en: -[Mya] come on! -[Gabby] That one.
translation.zh: -我们各让一步 -不 别这样  -不行 -这是米娅的

translation.en: -[Rush] I... -[man] Really?
translation.zh: -我… -嗯

translation.en: -[Rush] Wait-- -[Gabby] Yeah, of course that one!
translation.zh: -当然是这一棵了 -不

translation.en: -[Mya] No. -[Rush] Wait a minute. Hold on.
translation.zh: -我喜欢 -等一分钟 等一下

translation.en: -[Evie] Totally that one. -You're in charge.
translation.zh: -不 绝对是那棵 -你来负责

translation.en: -Don't let them get in trouble. -[Mya] All right, keep looking.
translation.zh: -别让她们惹麻烦了 -好嘞 不行！

translation.en: Principal Peters calls me and tells me that you've been cutting classes.
translation.zh: 彼得斯校长打电话给我说 你在学校里逃课

translation.en: You know, Harvard doesn't like that.
translation.zh: 你知道 哈佛可不喜欢这样的

translation.en: You see, it's funny you think Harvard's still happening.
translation.zh: 真搞笑 你认为哈佛还有希望

translation.en: What, you don't?
translation.zh: 怎么 你不这么想？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I just figured it's one of the big sacrifices.
translation.zh: 嗯 我想得到 这也是大牺牲之一

translation.en: Jamal, don't give up on yourself, son.
translation.zh: 贾马尔 别放弃你自己 儿子

translation.en: Why not? You did.
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？你就放弃了啊

translation.en: We are extremely poor. You're looking at disadvantaged youth.
translation.zh: 我们穷到响叮当 你眼前的可是弱势青年

translation.en: My father has no money, no prospects, none!
translation.zh: 我爸爸一分钱也没有 前途也没有 什么都没！

translation.en: -Isn't that Rush Williams? -Was.
translation.zh: -那不是拉什·威廉姆斯吗？ -曾经是

translation.en: [Mya] Now, about this tree...
translation.zh: 好了 来谈谈这棵树…

translation.en: See, you have a little wiggle room? Through these scrawny branches.
translation.zh: 你有没有商量的空间啊？ 就像这瘦巴巴的树枝间一样

translation.en: [Rush] Oh, whoa. Hey, now, look, I hate to crisp your Kringle,
translation.zh: 喔 喂 嘿 听着 我也不想泼你过节的冷水

translation.en: my darling daughter, but we agreed on a smaller tree this year.
translation.zh: 我亲爱的女儿 但我们说好了今年要买棵小点的树

translation.en: [scoffs] Sorry. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 啊 对不起 失陪一下

translation.en: Dad, I got this chump on the hook.
translation.zh: 老爸 我差点就把这个笨蛋说服了

translation.en: I am sure you do, Mya....
translation.zh: 我相信你 米娅…

translation.en: Listen, buddy,
translation.zh: 听着 朋友

translation.en: [stammering] what about that six-footer right over there?
translation.zh: 那边那棵一米八高的怎么样 ？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗯？ -嗯

translation.en: -Sure. -Oh, joy!
translation.zh: -可以 -哦 太好了！

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, Jamal.
translation.zh: 嗯 嘿 贾马尔

translation.en: It's Christmas, man.
translation.zh: 现在可是圣诞节啊

translation.en: This is our thing, it's what we do. We pick out a tree for our house.
translation.zh: 这是我们的传统 我们要一起选一棵树买回家

translation.en: It's not my house.
translation.zh: 那可不是我家

translation.en: Don't be like that, man.
translation.zh: 别这样啊 唉

translation.en: My house is in Whitestone.
translation.zh: 我的家在白石镇

translation.en: With a big tree, and big potential, and a big future.
translation.zh: 有一棵大大的树 大大的潜力和大大的未来

translation.en: And you made damn sure that's over.
translation.zh: 而多亏你 这一切都结束了

translation.en: You go sit your ass in the car, okay?
translation.zh: 你给我坐回车里去 知道吗？

translation.en: And I'ma go make some Christmas memories.
translation.zh: 我要去制造一些圣诞回忆了

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便了

translation.en: It ain't all got to be merry.
translation.zh: 不是非要所有人都开心的

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿

translation.en: -Whoo, that girl got to be cold. God... -Come on.
translation.zh: -唔 这女孩肯定冷死了吧 -拜托

translation.en: You know it's cute.
translation.zh: 你心里清楚这很好看

translation.en: Bailey's mom got her this sweet Dolce top for Christmas Mass. Me?
translation.zh: 贝利她妈圣诞给她 买了这件D&G的上装 我呢？

translation.en: I'll be stuck picking through the bins at Bargain Mart for some holiday sparkler.
translation.zh: 我只能在廉价超市 东摸西找一些节日烟花棒玩

translation.en: How's that supposed to make me feel?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会怎么想？

translation.en: Like you don't have a stupid parent who wasted all that money
translation.zh: 你会想你没有一个乱挥霍的笨家长

translation.en: on a piece of a shirt that makes his preteen daughter look like... [shudders]
translation.zh: 花钱买一件 让他十岁的女儿看上去像是个…

translation.en: -Dad! -[stammers] What came out of my mouth?
translation.zh: -老爸！ -我说什么了刚才？

translation.en: [sighs] You don't want me to be happy.
translation.zh: 你不想让我开心

translation.en: That's not it at all! I'm just saying, hmm?
translation.zh: 怎么可能！我告诉你哦 嗯？

translation.en: Over my dead body.
translation.zh: 我死了都不会这么想

translation.en: Dad! This is hard.
translation.zh: 老爸！这太难了

translation.en: On December 25th,
translation.zh: 12月25日的时候

translation.en: all my friends are going to blow up on Insta
translation.zh: 我所有的朋友都会在网上发照片

translation.en: with everybody showing off their swag.
translation.zh: 大家都会炫耀自己新买的货

translation.en: Kira is going to Hawaii!
translation.zh: 基拉要去夏威夷了！

translation.en: Ugh! I can't with her.
translation.zh: 恶！想到就来气

translation.en: -Can you just be happy for her? -Without being sad for myself.
translation.zh: -你就不能为她高兴高兴吗？ -不要自怜自艾？

translation.en: I know, Dad. That's easy for you to say.
translation.zh: 我知道 老爸 你说得倒轻松

translation.en: Can you give it some time?
translation.zh: 你能稍微有点耐性吗？

translation.en: We have got some joy coming our way.
translation.zh: 马上就会有很多喜乐要到来的

translation.en: -[inspirational instrumentals] -I just need you to believe that.
translation.zh: 我需要你坚信这一点

translation.en: I get what you're saying, but...
translation.zh: 我明白你说的意思 可…

translation.en: I'll be honest.
translation.zh: 说实话

translation.en: I don't have my heart wrapped around this yet.
translation.zh: 我现在还接受不了

translation.en: Gotta bounce. My bathroom time slot.
translation.zh: 要走了 轮到我用厕所了

translation.en: I do have hope, and I know you're trying your best.
translation.zh: 但我是抱有希望的 而且我知道你已经在尽力了

translation.en: It's gotta be hard.
translation.zh: 肯定很艰难

translation.en: I mean, we're not exactly low-maintenance. [laughs]
translation.zh: 毕竟我们很难伺候

translation.en: [stammers] I'm sorry, I didn't hear that. Can you say that again, please?
translation.zh: 不好意思 我没听清 你能不能再重复一遍？

translation.en: We're not low-maintenance.
translation.zh: 我们难伺候

translation.en: Oh, my God, my heart can't take how much I love you right now. Come here.
translation.zh: 我的天 我的心都要承受不了 我对你的爱了 来抱一下

translation.en: -Promise me something. -Mm?
translation.zh: -答应我一件事 -嗯？

translation.en: That Santa will bring me at least one Insta-worthy moment.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人至少会带给我 一个值得发INS的瞬间

translation.en: -Go, before you miss your time slot. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 去吧 趁还没错过你用厕所的时间前

translation.en: -[Roxy] Possible hoarder situation here. -[Rush laughs]
translation.zh: 这可能是个储物症患者

translation.en: This woman needs to purge.
translation.zh: 这女人得好好清理一下

translation.en: -What is she doing with a Thigh Master? -[laughs] I don't know.
translation.zh: 她要这个大腿锻炼器是要干嘛？

translation.en: [Aunt Jo, muffled] Don't you touch my precious things.
translation.zh: 别乱碰我的宝贝

translation.en: [whispering] How can she even hear us?
translation.zh: 她是怎么听到我们的？

translation.en: -You better stop messing with her stuff. -I'm...
translation.zh: -你最好别再乱动她的东西了 -我…

translation.en: Paula.
translation.zh: 宝拉

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: -[Roxy chuckles lightly] -[Rush] I forgot about this.
translation.zh: （贾马尔） 都忘了有这个了

translation.en: Just left it when we moved away. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们搬家的时候落在这里了

translation.en: Well, we gotta take it downstairs. Hang up the ornaments on the tree.
translation.zh: 那我们得拿下楼去 把装饰品都挂在树上

translation.en: -[Rush] Ha! -[Roxy chuckles]
translation.zh: 哈

translation.en: -[Rush] Look at Aunt Jo. -[Roxy] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -你看乔姑姑 -嗯哼
