translation.en: -[Rush] Who he look like? [laughs] -[Roxy]Oh, right. [laughs]
translation.zh: -他看上去像谁？ -哦 对噢

translation.en: [Rush] Yo!
translation.zh: 哟！

translation.en: She packed these away.
translation.zh: 她把这些都收起来了

translation.en: Oh, I wish I had sweet memories like that.
translation.zh: 噢 我多希望 我也有这样甜蜜的回忆啊

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You know, I remember this one Christmas.
translation.zh: 我记得有这么一个圣诞节

translation.en: I was seven, and it was the year my folks divorced,
translation.zh: 我当时七岁 那年我父母刚离婚

translation.en: [laughs] and they couldn't afford separate houses.
translation.zh: 然后… 他们没钱分开住

translation.en: -So they drew a line and split the house. -[playful instrumentals]
translation.zh: 于是他们画了条线 把房子一分为二

translation.en: Uh-huh. Yeah. Mom upstairs, Daddy downstairs.
translation.zh: 嗯哼 是的 妈妈在楼上 爸爸在楼下

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Roxy] It was like a war zone in there.
translation.zh: 简直就像是一个战场

translation.en: And then, on Christmas Eve, um,
translation.zh: 然后 到了圣诞夜

translation.en: Daddy had the house, and we were celebrating,
translation.zh: 房子归爸爸 我们正庆祝着呢

translation.en: and he snuck into my mom's room
translation.zh: 他偷偷溜进我妈的房间

translation.en: to get his Santa costume out the back of her closet,
translation.zh: 到她的衣柜去拿他的圣诞老人服

translation.en: and my brother got so freaked out that he was trespassing
translation.zh: 然后我哥哥都吓坏了 他这样非法闯入

translation.en: that he called Mom and she called the cops.
translation.zh: 于是他打了电话给妈妈 然后妈妈报了警

translation.en: [Roxy] And there was Daddy,
translation.zh: -我都不知道说什么 -然后呢 爸爸他就…

translation.en: tiptoeing in in his Santa costume to the front of the house,
translation.zh: 穿着圣诞老人服 在房子面前鬼鬼祟祟的

translation.en: and the cops tackled him before he got to the front door.
translation.zh: 还没来得及进前门 警察就把他按倒了

translation.en: [Roxy] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -[laughing] Oh, Roxy. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 噢 洛克茜

translation.en: [continued laughing] My sweet, sweet Roxy.
translation.zh: 我亲爱的洛克茜啊

translation.en: -You know what? You well-adjusted. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 你知道么？你身心真健康啊

translation.en: You really well-adjusted. [cackles] Considering.
translation.zh: 真的很健康 考虑到这样的环境

translation.en: [Rush] Help me take the stuff downstairs.
translation.zh: 帮我把这些搬下去吧

translation.en: -[Roxy] Yeah. -I got this box. I got this.
translation.zh: -嗯 -这箱我来 这个给我

translation.en: [Roxy] All right.
translation.zh: 好嘞

translation.en: Well, that's the last box.
translation.zh: 这是最后一盒了

translation.en: You gotta get that Christmas tree leaning up against the garage in here,
translation.zh: 你得把那棵靠着车库的圣诞树搬进来

translation.en: and set it up.
translation.zh: 然后装好了

translation.en: Christmas tradition. That thing stays outside for three days.
translation.zh: 我们圣诞的传统 东西要放在外面三天

translation.en: The only reason that tradition started is because you and your mother
translation.zh: 这之所以成为了传统 是因为你和你妈 不知道该让谁把树搬进来

translation.en: couldn't figure out who was going to bring the tree in.
translation.zh: 是因为你和你妈 不知道该让谁把树搬进来

translation.en: Well, thank the Lord you have these ornaments.
translation.zh: 感谢主 你们有这些装饰品

translation.en: I-- I expected a little more Christmas going on in here.
translation.zh: 我… 那个… 还以为 你们会有更多有圣诞氛围的东西

translation.en: I like a simple Christmas.
translation.zh: 我过圣诞节喜欢从简

translation.en: All I need is my Nativity,
translation.zh: 只需要有耶稣降生的场景

translation.en: and my lights on the tree,
translation.zh: 树上有灯

translation.en: -my baby Jesus, -[Roxy laughs softly]
translation.zh: 我的宝贝耶稣

translation.en: and a star to light the way.
translation.zh: 还有一颗照亮前路的星星就够了

translation.en: And it's gonna be a little bigger this year, for my babies.
translation.zh: 今年的要稍微大一点 为了我的宝贝们

translation.en: Mm. Well, they're lucky to have you, Josephine.
translation.zh: 嗯 他们有你真幸运 乔瑟芬

translation.en: -I keep telling them that. -[Roxy laughs]
translation.zh: 我一直跟他们这么说来着

translation.en: [Roxy] I love her. All right. I'm headed out.
translation.zh: 我好爱她 好嘞 我要走了

translation.en: I will see you at dinner.
translation.zh: 我们晚餐时见

translation.en: -I am looking forward to that dinner. -Mm-hmm, 7:00 p.m., okay?
translation.zh: -我很期待这场晚餐哦 -嗯 晚上七点 好吗？

translation.en: Enjoy your memories.
translation.zh: 好好享受你的这些回忆

translation.en: [Rush] All right.
translation.zh: 好嘞

translation.en: -[Roxy] Bye. -Be careful.
translation.zh: -拜 -小心哦

translation.en: -[Paula, on TV] Shh! Is it turned on? -[whispering] See if I can get it louder.
translation.zh: 嘘！ 看看我能不能开响一点

translation.en: [whispering and laughing] Come on, you've got to see this. Come on.
translation.zh: 快来 你一定得看一下 快来

translation.en: He's so tired. [laughs]
translation.zh: 他累坏了

translation.en: Aw. Look.
translation.zh: 嗷

translation.en: [Mya] Look, it's Mommy.
translation.zh: 看 那是妈妈！

translation.en: [Rush] Oh, look at these little lurkers.
translation.zh: 哦 瞧瞧这些鬼鬼祟祟的小家伙

translation.en: -[girls giggling] -You know, the view is actually better from the sofa.
translation.zh: 你们知道么 从沙发看起来 效果要好很多哦

translation.en: -[Rush] If you're interested. -[Evie] Let's go see.
translation.zh: -如果你们有兴趣的话 -我想去看看

translation.en: -[Rush and Aunt Jo laugh] -[Evie] I wanna see better.
translation.zh: 我想看得清楚点

translation.en: -[Aunt Jo] Sit next to Auntie. -[Rush] Me and my girls. Come here.
translation.zh: -坐到姑姑旁边来 -我的女儿们来了 过来

translation.en: Whoo, this one is a kicker.
translation.zh: 唔 这个小家伙喜欢踢人

translation.zh: 我给他所有的朋友都发了信息

translation.en: Even my contacts in his class. No one's seen him.
translation.zh: 连我认识的他班上的人也打了 没人见过他

translation.en: -[door closes] -[Roxy] Hey, everybody.
translation.zh: 大家怎么样

translation.en: -Josephine, we hear anything? -Baby, not a word.
translation.zh: -乔瑟芬 有什么消息吗？ -宝贝 什么都没

translation.en: And it's Aunt Jo from now on.
translation.zh: 从现在起叫我乔姑姑吧

translation.en: I'm going to pop a 'gram about bedazzling his Jordans.
translation.zh: 我要发个INS说 我要在他的乔丹鞋上涂亮片了

translation.en: That should get Jamal texting me back,
translation.zh: 这样贾马尔应该就会回我信息了

translation.en: -or running home to kick my-- -Mya... please!
translation.zh: 或者跑回家来揍我… 米娅… 拜托！

translation.en: [Rush] I can't think.
translation.zh: 我没法思考了

translation.en: I know. Let's go sit down. Come on.
translation.zh: 我懂 我们先坐下再说 来吧

translation.en: Listen. We will find him, okay? And you know he loves you.
translation.zh: 听着 我们会找到他的 知道吗？ 你知道他是爱你的

translation.en: -He's just hurting. -No, this is on me.
translation.zh: -他只是有点受伤 -不 是我的错

translation.en: I've been way too selfish, going after this dream.
translation.zh: 一直以来都是我太自私了 追逐这个梦想

translation.en: My one concern, my only concern, should've been what's best for my kids.
translation.zh: 我唯一的在乎 我唯一的担心 应该是怎么样对我的孩子们最好

translation.en: I gotta find my son.
translation.zh: 我必须得找到我的儿子

translation.en: [Roxy] I'll hit the streets with Mya, text you if we hear anything.
translation.zh: 我跟米娅到街上去找 一听到什么消息就发信息给你

translation.en: [Reginald] I have to say, I just keep outdoing myself.
translation.zh: 我必须得说 我真是越做越棒

translation.en: Year after year.
translation.zh: 一年比一年好

translation.en: Wow, it's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 哇 真是美极了

translation.en: Well, aren't you Josephine Robinson's little one?
translation.zh: 噢 你不是 乔瑟芬·罗宾逊的小宝贝吗？

translation.en: I am. And this is--
translation.zh: 我是的 这位是…

translation.en: -A very fine-looking woman. [laughs] -[Roxy laughs]
translation.zh: 一位大美女

translation.en: Roxy. And thank you.
translation.zh: 洛克茜 谢谢你

translation.en: -Are you my Christmas present? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你就是… 我的圣诞礼物吗？

translation.en: [inhales] Well, I'm never mad at a little old school.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我对老前辈是生不了气的

translation.en: Mister, you need to cool it down. We're looking for my brother, Jamal.
translation.zh: 先生 你得消停一点 我们这是再找我哥哥 贾马尔

translation.en: I haven't seen him. But, I wouldn't know it if I did.
translation.zh: 我没见过他 就算我看见了也不认识

translation.en: But, I'll keep an eye out for him, if you like.
translation.zh: 但如果你想的话 我会帮你们留意的

translation.en: He looks like this, except angrier. Think you can look for him better, now?
translation.zh: 他长这个样 不过应该气冲冲的 现在你认得出他了吗？

translation.en: All right, we want to thank you for your help and we hope you have
translation.zh: 好嘞 我们非常感激你的帮助 祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: -a very merry Christmas. -You be sure to tell Josephine
translation.zh: 祝你圣诞快乐 你一定要跟乔瑟芬说

translation.en: that Reginald Miller said "merry Christmas."
translation.zh: 雷金纳德·米勒跟她说“圣诞快乐”了

translation.en: And she can always call me if she needs help getting her lights put up.
translation.zh: 还有如果她需要人帮忙挂灯的话 可以打电话给我哦

translation.en: If you "know her" know her,
translation.zh: 如果你真了解她 你就知道

translation.en: all Aunt Jo needs is her star on a tree, and her baby Jesus.
translation.zh: 乔姑姑只需要树上有颗星 还有她的宝贝耶稣

translation.en: [Roxy] All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好嘞 我们走

translation.en: [Rush] Hey, y'all see Jamal?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们见过贾马尔吗？

translation.en: [young man] No, we ain't see him. Sorry, Mister Williams.
translation.zh: 没 我们没见过他 抱歉 威廉姆斯先生

translation.en: [yelling] Jamal?
translation.zh: 贾马尔？

translation.en: I hate coming here! [strained yelling]
translation.zh: 我恨…

translation.en: Boy!
translation.zh: 孩子！

translation.en: -Jamal. -[man, yelling] He moved!
translation.zh: 贾马尔 他搬走了！

translation.en: Don't you think I know that, Jimmy?
translation.zh: 你觉得我不知道么 吉米？

translation.en: [Jimmy] Hey, you're not on the radio anymore!
translation.zh: 嘿 你不做电台了啊？

translation.en: Don't you think I know that, Jimmy?
translation.zh: 你觉得我不知道么 吉米？

translation.en: Je--
translation.zh: 天…

translation.en: Merry Christmas! Merry...
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐！圣诞…

translation.en: [Jimmy] Merry Christmas to you too!
translation.zh: 也祝你圣诞快乐！

translation.en: -[Roxy] Has he ever done this before? -[Mya] No.
translation.zh: -他以前这样过吗？ -没有

translation.en: Jamal's never done anything like this.
translation.zh: 贾马尔从来没做过这样的事

translation.en: -At the old house, maybe? -Maybe.
translation.zh: -在老家呢 有没有？ -可能有吧

translation.en: -Oh, here. Let me help you. I can... -[woman sighs]
translation.zh: 噢 你好 我来帮你吧 我可以…

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: I am so late for work.
translation.zh: 我上班要迟到了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好嘞

translation.en: [Mya] Aw.
translation.zh: 嗷

translation.en: -Look, how cute. -[baby coos]
translation.zh: 你看呀 好可爱

translation.en: You're so good with her. You have a little one?
translation.zh: 挺会照顾她的啊 你家也有个小宝宝？

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, me? No. No, no.
translation.zh: 噢 我啊？没有

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I thought she was one of yours.
translation.zh: 噢 抱歉 我还以为她是你女儿呢

translation.en: -Oh, no. I mean, not exactly. -We're pretty tight.
translation.zh: -噢 不是 也不能这么说 -我们挺熟的

translation.en: -I'll, uh... -She is beautiful.
translation.zh: 我来… 她好美

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Where do the babies go while you work?
translation.zh: 你上班的时候 婴儿怎么办？

translation.en: Uh, I take a bus to a friend's,
translation.zh: 我先坐公车去朋友家

translation.en: then after that, a bus to work. After work, do it all in reverse.
translation.zh: 然后再坐公车去上班 下班后 反过来坐一趟

translation.en: Even on Christmas Eve?
translation.zh: 就算是圣诞夜？

translation.en: Holiday pay! Double time.
translation.zh: 加班工资！有两倍呢

translation.en: I mean, I wish work was closer, but money and all.
translation.zh: 我当然希望上班的地方近点 但钱嘛 没办法

translation.en: I take the help where I can.
translation.zh: 能多赚点是一点

translation.en: But look at these little nuggets. Everything I do, totally worth it.
translation.zh: 但你瞧瞧这几个小宝贝 我做得一切… 完全值得

translation.en: -I hear you, sis. Good luck. -[woman] Thank you.
translation.zh: -我懂的 姐妹 祝你好运 -谢谢你

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: It's just another day for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说不过是平常的一天罢了

translation.en: -♪ Silent night ♪ -Actually...
translation.zh: 不过…

translation.en: Yes, merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 是的 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -♪ Holy night ♪ -And thank you, for the reminder to breathe.
translation.zh: 还有 谢谢你们 提醒我要呼吸下去

translation.en: -I love you, Auntie Jo. -[laughs] I love you, too.
translation.zh: -我爱你 乔姑姑 -我也爱你们

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 好了…

translation.en: it's time...
translation.zh: 是时候…

translation.en: to hang the star up.
translation.zh: 把星星挂上去了

translation.en: -[girls gasp] -This is Auntie's favorite part.
translation.zh: 这是姑姑最喜欢的部分

translation.en: The star lights the path for anyone...
translation.zh: 这颗星星会照亮所有人的前路…

translation.en: who wants to find their way home.
translation.zh: 让他们能找到路回家

translation.en: -[Roxy] Hey. Nothing. -[Aunt Jo] I haven't heard a peep.
translation.zh: 嘿 -没消息 -我什么都没听说

translation.en: -Should we call the police? -Not yet.
translation.zh: -我们要报警吗？ -先别

translation.en: -[Rush sighs] -It's Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 今天是圣诞夜

translation.en: It's the time for family to be together.
translation.zh: 是全家人团聚的时候

translation.en: To tell stories, to hang stockings,
translation.zh: 一起讲故事 一起挂长袜

translation.en: to open presents.
translation.zh: 一起打开礼物的时候

translation.en: This is not how it's supposed to be.
translation.zh: 今晚不应该这样啊

translation.en: I know where he is.
translation.zh: 我知道他在哪里了

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上就回来

translation.en: Jamal, you got a lot of people worried.
translation.zh: 贾马尔 你让大家都很担心啊

translation.en: -[huffs] -So?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: Son, Roxy has always been a very welcome part of our family.
translation.zh: 儿子 洛克茜很受我们家欢迎 她一直以来都是我们家的一部分啊

translation.en: That's not it.
translation.zh: 跟这没关系

translation.en: What, Jamal? What? College?
translation.zh: 那怎么了 贾马尔？大学吗？ 你知道我们会有办法…

translation.en: -You know we're gonna find-- -I lost her, too.
translation.zh: 那怎么了 贾马尔？大学吗？ 你知道我们会有办法… 我也会失去她的

translation.en: I remember Mom getting sick in that house.
translation.zh: 我记得妈妈在那栋房子里生病的样子

translation.en: It's hard to be there.
translation.zh: 待在那里太难了

translation.en: It's like, when I'm in that house... [stammers]
translation.zh: 就好像 我在那栋房子里时 我…

translation.en: I don't feel her.
translation.zh: 我感觉不到她

translation.en: I don't hear her voice.
translation.zh: 我听不到她的声音

translation.en: And that's why you're here.
translation.zh: 所以你才来这里

translation.en: -[sighs] -It's your mom's favorite place,
translation.zh: 这是你妈最喜欢的地方

translation.en: you know how she loved seeing the city lights at Christmas.
translation.zh: 你知道她最爱在圣诞节 看着城市的灯光

translation.en: I won't forget her.
translation.zh: 我不会忘了她的

translation.en: Son... no.
translation.zh: 儿子… 不是这样的

translation.en: Your mom, she's everywhere that we are. She's in everything that we do.
translation.zh: 你妈 我们在哪里 她就在哪里 无论我们做什么 她都会在

translation.en: Your mother's all around us.
translation.zh: 你妈她一直在我们身边啊

translation.en: I get all that.
translation.zh: 我是这么想的

translation.en: Do you?
translation.zh: 但你呢？

translation.en: After she died,
translation.zh: 在她死后

translation.en: you took me away from the only home I knew.
translation.zh: 你把我从我唯一熟悉的家中带走

translation.en: Put us all in that, that big house,
translation.zh: 把我们都丢到… 那间大房子里

translation.en: buying us all those things.
translation.zh: 给我们买各种各样的东西

translation.en: It just seemed like you were trying to shut down the memories.
translation.zh: 感觉好像你是想用物质 把所有的回忆堵上似的
我…

translation.en: Ah, damn.
translation.zh: 啊 该死

translation.en: Man, [stammering] I thought keeping my grieving to myself was the right move,
translation.zh: 唉 我以为把悲伤 留给我自己是正确的做法

translation.en: you know? I'm just...
translation.zh: 你知道么？我只是…

translation.en: Just trying to be a strong father for my kids, man. I...
translation.zh: 我只是想在孩子么面前 做个坚强的爸爸 我…

translation.en: I get you.
translation.zh: 我理解你

translation.en: Look at me, son.
translation.zh: 看着我 儿子

translation.en: I get you.
translation.zh: 我理解的

translation.en: She was... always excited on Christmas morning.
translation.zh: 唉 她… 圣诞节早晨总是那么激动

translation.en: She'd be up super early making all this noise in the kitchen,
translation.zh: 她总会起个大早 弄得厨房里叮当作响

translation.en: trying to wake me up. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 把我叫醒

translation.en: We'd be up in the wee hours of the morning wrapping gifts,
translation.zh: 我们早上三点就会起来包礼物

translation.en: -[chuckles] -reading instruction manuals, -and assembling bicycles. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 读着说明书 拼装自行车

translation.en: Okay? She could not wait to see the smile on your face
translation.zh: 知道吗？她等不及想要见到 你打开礼物时脸上的笑容

translation.en: -when you'd open them up. -[playful chuckle]
translation.zh: 你打开礼物时脸上的笑容

translation.en: What kind of mom bangs pots at 6:00 in the morning,
translation.zh: 这世界上哪有六点敲着锅

translation.en: trying to wake her kid up?
translation.zh: 把孩子弄醒的妈妈啊？

translation.en: Your mom.
translation.zh: 你妈啊

translation.en: And you just knew I was waiting for that noise to run downstairs.
translation.zh: 我一听到那声音就立马跑下楼

translation.en: Man.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: We got to keep these stories alive.
translation.zh: 我们一定得让这些故事保留下去

translation.en: For Mya. For the twins.
translation.zh: 为了米娅 为了双胞胎

translation.en: -Yeah. -You think you can help me with that?
translation.zh: -是啊 -你觉得你能帮我一起吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: 嗯 我能

translation.en: And we all deserve to make new memories, too.
translation.zh: 但我们也都值得制造些新回忆

translation.en: You know your mom would've insisted on it.
translation.zh: 你心里清楚你妈会坚持要我们这样的

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry about Roxy.
translation.zh: 听着 对不起 关于洛克茜的事

translation.en: She's a good woman, son.
translation.zh: 她是个好女人 儿子

translation.en: And I love her.
translation.zh: 而且我很爱她

translation.en: You do?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: [stammers] I ain't never really said that out loud.
translation.zh: 我还从没大声说出来过

translation.en: But yes, absolutely.
translation.zh: 但没错 绝对的

translation.en: Dad, you've always been there for me, a hundred and ten percent.
translation.zh: 老爸 你一直陪在我身边 百分之一百一

translation.en: Now it's time for you.
translation.zh: 也许现在该留些时间给你了

translation.en: Yeah, maybe you're right.
translation.zh: 嗯 也许你是对的

translation.en: You good?
translation.zh: 你好了吗？

translation.en: I'm getting there. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好起来了吧

translation.en: Let's go home.
translation.zh: 我们回家吧

translation.en: [slurring] Who you staring at?
translation.zh: 你这是盯着谁啊？

translation.en: It's not my fault that you're not on air.
translation.zh: 你不做节目了 又不是我的错

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: Maybe it is my fault.
translation.zh: 也许这真是我的错

translation.en: [gasps] Screwing my friends on Christmas.
translation.zh: 过圣诞节的时候 陷害自己的朋友

translation.en: Him.
translation.zh: 他啊

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 就在那

translation.en: Heartless.
translation.zh: 太没良心了

translation.en: Why are you still smiling, though?
translation.zh: 可你为什么还在微笑着呢？

translation.en: Maybe it's not too late.
translation.zh: 也许现在还为时不晚

translation.en: Maybe it's time for Santa Marshall.
translation.zh: 也许圣诞老人马歇尔要登场了

translation.en: Yeah. [laughs]
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Yeah, that's it.
translation.zh: 对 就这样

translation.en: -[echoing clap] -Maybe it's time for Santa Marshall, yeah.
translation.zh: 也许圣诞老人马歇尔是要登场了

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: -["Joy To The World" continuing] -Aye, I feel the joy, there it is!
translation.zh: 诶 我感觉到喜乐了 这样就对了嘛！

translation.en: -♪ Joy to the world ♪ -Yes, yes, yes!
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: [Whitney Houston and Marshall] ♪ And heaven and nature sing! ♪
translation.zh: 诸天万物歌唱！

translation.en: ♪ And heaven and nature sing! ♪
translation.zh: 诸天万物歌唱！

translation.en: [Marshall only] ♪ And heaven and na-na-na-na ♪
translation.zh: 诸天万物…

translation.en: ♪ Nature sings! ♪
translation.zh: 齐歌唱！

translation.en: Yes, I'm leaving. I'mma take care of this.
translation.zh: 对了 我要走了 就交给我了

translation.en: It's going to be all right. It's going to be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会好的 一切都会没事的

translation.en: Look who I found.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧我找到了谁

translation.en: [Aunt Jo sighs] Praise the Lord. Come here, boy.
translation.zh: 赞美主 来抱抱我 孩子

translation.en: I'm squeezing you now, but you and me,
translation.zh: 我现在是紧抱着你 但你和我啊 我们之后要好好谈谈这件事

translation.en: we're going to have a straight talk after this.
translation.zh: 但你和我啊 我们之后要好好谈谈这件事

translation.en: Aunt Jo.
translation.zh: 乔姑姑…

translation.en: So what happened to simple Christmas?
translation.zh: 不是要圣诞节从简过吗？

translation.en: The twins did all of this.
translation.zh: 都是双胞胎弄的

translation.en: I did not have a hand in it.
translation.zh: 我一点忙也没帮

translation.en: -Where's my twofer? -[lights click on]
translation.zh: 我的“双响炮”呢？

translation.en: -[Gabby, Evie] Daddy, the lights! -[Aunt Jo chuckles]
translation.zh: 老爸 灯光！

translation.en: [Mya] Come outside, everyone!
translation.zh: 快出来呀 大家！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快来

translation.en: And just like that, it's Christmas!
translation.zh: 这样一来 圣诞节就到了！

translation.en: -[laughter] -[Aunt Jo] Oh, wow! Yes! [laughs]
translation.zh: 噢 哇喔！太好了

translation.en: Let me get this right. You did this by yourself?
translation.zh: 我要问清楚了 这都是你自己一个人弄的？

translation.en: Well, I had a little help. [giggles]
translation.zh: 这个嘛 有人帮了点小忙

translation.en: -[Rush] Oh! -[Roxy laughs]
translation.zh: 噢！

translation.en: -Hey! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: It was Miss Mya. She wanted to make the house a little magical.
translation.zh: 都是米娅小姐的功劳 她想让这栋房子看上去神奇一点

translation.en: -Let me see. -[puckering]
translation.zh: 让我瞧瞧

translation.en: Oh, all right. -Well, maybe we need a little more magic. -[Rush laughs]
translation.zh: 噢 好吧 也许我们还需要更神奇一点

translation.en: I think it looks homey. [clicks tongue] That's what I was going for.
translation.zh: 我觉得看上去很有家的感觉 我就想要这样的效果

translation.en: -[Rush] It's beautiful. -Where did you get all these lights?
translation.zh: -很美丽 -你是从那儿弄来的灯？

translation.en: Well, we were looking for Jamal, we met all these neighbors...
translation.zh: 这个嘛 刚才找贾马尔的时候 我们遇见了好些邻居…

translation.en: Told us stories about you growing up, Dad. And then, there's this man,
translation.zh: 跟我们说了很多你小时候的故事 老爸 然后 碰上了这么个人

translation.en: Mister Miller.
translation.zh: 米勒先生

translation.en: -Reginald? -[Mya] Yes!
translation.zh: -雷金纳德？ -对！

translation.en: He lent us all these lights.
translation.zh: 他把这些灯都借给我们了

translation.en: And, Aunt Jo, I think he's sweet on you.
translation.zh: 还有 乔姑姑 我感觉她喜欢你

translation.en: Well, my, my, my.
translation.zh: 哎呦 天呐

translation.en: [Jamal] Look,
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: -Roxy, I'm sorry about what I said-- -Oh, come in here.
translation.zh: -洛克茜 我对我说的话很抱… -噢 来抱抱吧

translation.en: -Don't even worry about it. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -别担心了 -谢谢你

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 嗯哼

translation.en: So, a Williams,

translation.en: my son, gets into Harvard. I'mma do whatever it takes.

translation.en: -[Rush] I love you, man. -Love you, too.

translation.en: I'm proud of you. Proud of you, son.

translation.en: ♪ Christmas everywhere ♪

translation.en: Mommy's sapphire necklace. Oh, wow, Daddy.

translation.en: Here.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: Oh.

你”

translation.en: 'cause golly it's about to get jolly up in here.

translation.en: -[gasping, oohing] -[Mya] Wow!
